1a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ma lus pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ sa ka la ta nA~M sa b+ha hA
1b2(rgyud 'grel): tani shrI gu rgyas nAm/ bde skad du/
2a1(rgyud 'grel): don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
2a2(rgyud 'grel): lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos po med cing khyab pa mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang 'jig rten
2a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dag las rnam grol ma// gang zhig rtog 'byung zhi la rgyal ba dam pa khyu mchog rnams kyis phyag byas bsam gtan
2b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba// ci yang rung ba'i gnas gyur dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sku yi dam pa rnam pa dag rna nang gi bdag nyid kyis 'jug pa// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs par bya ba min zhing dri
2b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams dang bral ba de nyid la phyag 'tshal nas// go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba tshel byed po nya mchog gyur sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing // spyod pa sna tshogs dang 'brel rtsod bI dr-i m+b+hi
2b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyis byas pa'i g.yeng ba spong byed pa'i// dngos grub rnams kyi skye sa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston brgya phrag mang po'i gnas gyur ma lta bu// mchog tu legs spyod thar pa star
2b4(rgyud 'grel): byed rin chen gyur pa dpal ldan gsang po grub pa bshad// yon tan dpag med gzhir gyur pa// mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi sku// gang gi spyod yul las 'das pa// dang por
3a1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen phyag byas nas// gsang ba grub pa bla med pa// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// sems ni snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// pad+ma rdo rje bdag gis bshad// rgyud gzhan du ma nyid du yang // sangs rgyas mgon pos ma gsungs
3a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nges pa'i man ngag dang ldan pas// de ni da ltar bdag gis bshad// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'bad pa thams cad spang bar bya// bskyed pa mang zhing ring ba dang // dang po'i las can bsgom pa'i phyir// rgyud kyi dam pa'i dngos brten nas/
3a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can// bsgom pa yi ni bar chad can// rgyas pa thams cad rnam spangs la// sangs rgyas dngos grub legs ster ba// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang ba grub pa bla med pa// bzang pos mdor bsdus
3a4(rgyud 'grel): da par bya// dge 'byung nyon mongs med pa dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs mdzad cing // dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur pa// ying bzhin nor bu mchog lta bu// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed cing // g.yeng ba'i dgra rnams 'joms
3a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// don rnams thams cad grub byed pa// mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid do// gang dang gang der gnas na yang // thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// bsgom pa dag la rab gnas na// sgrub po gang de dngos grub 'gyur// sbas pa'i brtul
3a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs dang ldan pas// chos rnams dang yang 'gal med par// rdor gsum dbye ru med gzugs can// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas// bla med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// srog chags gsod
3b1(rgyud 'grel): cing khro ba dang // gang yang khro ba'i las dga' zhing // rdzun gyi tshig gis spros pa yis// mi gang rmongs pas 'tsho ba yi// mi de dag kyang myur bar 'dir// spyod pa 'dis ni 'grub par 'dug gzhan gyi chung ma spyod pa dang // gzhan gyi nor la rku ba dang //
3b2(rgyud 'grel): dman pa'i las can smad pa gang // rtag tu spyod par byed pa dang // gang la spyod pas 'dod khams kyi// steng gi pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// sbas pa'i rtul zhugs ngo bo nyid// sgrub pa po la bdag gis brjod// gsang ba'i spyod pa mchog bzang
3b3(rgyud 'grel): po|/ dngos grub kun ster thabs bcas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gang yin// tshe 'dis la las thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mchog tu zhi ba nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa'i gnas// thob par 'dod pas mchog zhi ba/
3b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba grub pas bsgrub par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya// gzhan du de nyid dman pas ni// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// de nyid brtags pa rnams las gzhan// khyad par thams
3b5(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam spangs shing // mtshon ma med cing snang ba med// gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// lung dang bstan bcos lugs rim pas// ji srid rtog pa dang bcas pas// de srid bur du rgyas 'gyur te// chu la 'bru mar thim pa bzhin// re
3b6(rgyud 'grel): zhig rtogs nges dgos med chog/ rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa yi// bstan bcis de nyid tshol mi dgos// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo nyid// dang por de nyid shes byas la// de nyid bsgrub phyir nyes gnas bya// de nas bsgom la 'bad pa
4a1(rgyud 'grel): yis// nyams su myong ba bskyed par bya// de nyid gsal bar gyur sems kyis// phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad// rig pa dang ldan brtul zhugs kyang // de yi rjes la spyad par bya// gcig pu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// gas
4a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spyod pa spyad nas ni// de ni mthar thug skyes gyur nas// phyi nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// gzhan du de nyid dman pa yi// 'tshe ba'i rgyu can nyid gyur pa// dmyal ba 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu// brtul zhugs kyis ni ci zhig bya// grub po
4a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid la gnas pas// brtul zhugs med par 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs brgya phrag la spyad kyang // de nyid dman na 'grub mi 'gyur// de nyid ldan na thams cad kyis// dri med de ni 'grub par 'gyur// sgrub po sgom pa dang ldan zhing // /
4a4(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa kun las rnam grol bas// brtul zhugs kyis ni chags med thob// dngos grub rgyal pos thob ma gsungs// dngos grub de nyid shes gyur nas// 'thob kyi brtul zhugs kyis ni min// chags pa kun las log gyur cing // slongs mo//
4a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bor bya ba ste// de tsam brtul zhugs kyis khyab 'gyur// de nyid spangs nas dngos grub med// 'bab stegs lha rten sbyin pa'ang min// khrus dang dka' thub de bzhin te// 'di kun bden pa ma yin gyi// 'di nyid gcig pu bden pa nyid//
4a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa skyed par byed pa yi// ngan pa'i las dag sngon byas pas// de nyid dman pa'i lus can gyis// brtul zhugs ngo bo ma lus myong // mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // srid par ngal bar byas pas kyang // de nyid ldan na 'grub 'gyur te//
4b1(rgyud 'grel): nor rnams phun tshogs bdag nyid kyi// de nyid rin chen sgom byed na// brtul zhugs med kyang de nyid ni// nges par bla na med par 'gro// lung gi spyod pa las gsungs pa'i// brtul zhugs gang zhig 'dir gnas pa// nor rnams sgrub par mi nus pas// 'tsho ba'i
4b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni brtag pa nyid// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs// rnam par shes pa'i gzhir gyur ltar// de ltar de nyid ldan brtul zhugs// de nyid los ni 'jug par brtan// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu phyir dang // nor la sogs pa sgrub phyir dang // sems
4b3(rgyud 'grel): don du de 'ong bcas// brtul bu gas zhal gyis bzhis pa yin// 'tsho ba yis ni thabs tsam du// mo mo'i skye bos gcer byed pas// ji sngar mtshan mo'i che ba nyid// de nyid bral na dngos grub med// nor gyi 'byor pa ldan po'i bdug/ rtag tu bsgom
4b4(rgyud 'grel): pas ngel byas pa'i// smyon pa'i gzugs nyid la brten cing // gsang ba grub par rnam gnas nas// de nyid rdo rje 'chang bla ma// bsgom dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan du de nyid ldan gyur kyang // dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur// de ltar
4b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol yongs bcad lnga// de nyid tha mong shes byas nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges bya ste// blo ldan gsang ba grub par spyod// rnam par g.yeng ba kun gyi gzhi// brtul zhugs spangs shing de nyid shes// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// ga 'phang ma
4b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo bsgrub par bya// de nying du yang byung gnas paso// dpal ldan gsong ba 'dus por gas so// skyes pa dum rgyas sbyor bas/ ka' dus sa ngos bstan pa yin// bye ba spyang pa'i dbye ba dang // mang spu'i sngo snod la sogs su// mchog tu na
5a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu nyid// rnam pa du mar rnam par gnas// phung po rin chen snod nyid du// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis// de nyid 'bad pas bla mdzad nas// sangs rgyas mgon pos rnam par bzhag/ byang chub sems mchog rnam par
5a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin byis// rang gi lus la rab gnas pa// de ni 'bad pas rig par bya// de nas spyod pa bya ba 'am// khyim du gnas te bsgom par bya// de nyid rin chen rnam dag bdag/ rtsod pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// thabs bzangs pa ni rnam spangs nas//
5a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba'i dam tshigs la sogs la// gzhan du gang zhig sgrub gyur pa// de ni ngu 'bod sogs par 'tshed// ji ltar me ni 'bar gyur pa// de ni rtsa shing phung po dag/ bcug nas thal ba nyid du 'gyur// myu gu sogs pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur// de bzhin de nyid med
5a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// ngo mtshar che ba ltar byed pa// ji srid na mkha' gnas bar du sha/ shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal bar 'gro/ ji ltar 'ga' zhig sbrul gdug la// sman dang sngags sogs mi ldan par// rmongs pa bdag nyid gang rtse ba// gshin rje'i gnas 'gro 'dod pa yin//
5a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mtha' med rgya mtsho la// grub med gzhan zhig 'jug 'gyur ba// thabs dang rten med gyur nas ni// skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin dza yi mtha' can rgyud// yang dag rab sbyin spangs gyur pa// smad cing dman pa'i las rnams ni// byas na
5a6(rgyud 'grel): mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur// rnyed dka' bla med go 'phang mchog/ de nyid ces byar mngon brjod pa// gang gis dag pa de thob pa// de yi thabs ni bdag gis brjod// bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin// gang gis gnyis su med par mthong // dngos grub bsdus pa'i
5b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid can// de nyid de ni 'dir thob 'gyur// gang yang khro zhing nga rgyal can// bslus pa byis dang spros la dga'// 'dod cing chags pa'i sems can gang // gang las rnyed cing gang las min// g.yo sgyus bla mar phyag byed cing // skyon rtog pa la ched
5b2(rgyud 'grel): du byed// brdzun pas nga rgyal gdug pa can// tshig gis rtsod la rtag tu gnas// rdo rje spun dang bla ma la// bslu ba'i bsam pa brtan pa can// sems can des ni dngos grub kun// ster ba'i go 'phang de mi thob// 'dir ni 'di 'dra gzhan yang mthong // ji
5b3(rgyud 'grel): srid 'dod pa thob par du// phyag 'tshal mchod dang bsnyen bkur gyis// brtan par bla mo mnyes byas nas// go 'phang mchog ni thob nas ni// mdun nyid na ni gnas na yang // su zhig gang nas ji ltar 'ongs// rang bzhin ngan pas mi shes so// gcig pu mtho
5b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ring po nas// gus par phyag ni 'tshal byed cing // de yang mang po'i nang du ni// bde bar byon nam tsam gyis phongs// de lta bu yi sems can gang // mya ngan 'das mchog go 'phang mchog/ yang dag gsungs pas gang gsungs pa// de yi thob par
5b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can 'di lta bu// bla ma smod dang ngag kyang mthong // ngo tsho spangs shing spyod pa ring // yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa// rgyud ni bsdu ba tsam nyid kyis// de yi dngos la kha phyir ltas// dbang bskur rjes gnang med par
5b6(rgyud 'grel): yang // slob ma dag ni sdud par byed// glegs bam mthong bas dga' gyur nas// gsang sngags rang nyid len par byed// slob dpon las ni shes min pa// dam tshig spyod pa rnam par spangs// sems can rnams ni sdud pa na// grags bam bka' yi
6a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin// de nyid shes pa ma yin par// gang phyir yang dag gsungs pas bstan// de lta bu dang de dag nyid// kun kyang sdig pa'i las can de// dam pa min pa'i lam zhugs nas// dmyal ba dag tu 'gro bar gcan/
6a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal 'phongs dang nyon mongs dang // sna tshogs nad kyis btses pa'i mthar// shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod na ni// dam tshig spyod pa spangs pa yis// sgrub dka' de/
6a3(rgyud 'grel): dadeng lhan cig tu// gnas pa nyid du'ang mi bya'o// dngos po kun gyi slob dpon la// ji srid mnyes par gyur par du// lus ngag yid kyi brtan pa ru// dus ni ring por mnyes byed pa'i// slob ma shin tu dri med pa'i// de nyid yang dag rab sbyin gnas/
6a4(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin gyis// de nas bgegs med thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i dngos// de nyid rgyal po yangs pa ste// nyin dang mtshan du bsgoms pa yis// dngos grub myur du des 'thob 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyas
6a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'i// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang po la// rgyud rnams du mar gsungs pa yi// bzlas dang sbyin bsreg brtul zhugs sogs// blun mtshams bzhi yi tshig yi// yul dang dkyil 'khor bri la sogs// kha dog gzugs sogs dbye ba
6a6(rgyud 'grel): yi// rig rnams su ni rnam brtags dang // khrus dang lha mchod sbyang ba dang // phyag rgya 'ching ba'i rigs de bzhin// sku gzugs la sogs cho ga dang // mchod rten las ni rgyas pa dang // de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// rnam rtog sna tshogs
6b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yi// grub pa sems can bsam rim bzhin// dpal 'byung ba yi mgon pos gsungs// de ltar rnam rtog 'bum phrag gi/ yang dag gsung ba grub gsungs pa// der ni dngos grub gang grub pa'am// 'on kyang 'dir ni de mi
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// lo gcig la sogs bskal pa dang // gcig dang gnyis su sbrid pa'i mthar// sgrub po gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba// chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas gyur pa// skye ba grangs med du ma ru// bsgom la brtan zhing chags med pas// sgrub
6b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang po grub pa ru// 'gyur bar gang zhig sngar gsungs pa// de ni re zhig 'dir mi dgos// thob par 'gyur ba dgos ma yin// grub pa'i bde ba las lhag pa'i// lus gdungs sdug bsngal gyis mi 'thob/ dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes
6b4(rgyud 'grel): bya 'dir// spros pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal ldan 'dus las mchog gzhan med// 'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen gyur// snying po las kyang snying
6b5(rgyud 'grel): bo mchog/ rgyud kun gyis ni bla ma'i bla// bstan dang bshad pas rnam gnas pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rim pa nyid// 'dus pa gang gis mi shes pa// de yi dngos grub ji ltar 'grub// the tshom thams cad gcod byed cing // mi shes rab
6b6(rgyud 'grel): rib sel byed pa// sangs rgyas rin che ni za ma tog/ dpal ldan 'dus pa yongs spangs nas// rnam rtog du mas brtags pa yis// rmongs pa dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// mkha' la khu tshur rdeg pa dang // smi go rgyu'i chu la 'thung
7a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// dang po'i las can bsgom pa yi// spros pa'i rgyud rnams spang byas shing // thabs dang shes rab shes byas nas// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par mnos// de phyir nges byas sems gcig pa// blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya//
7a2(rgyud 'grel): nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// 'di la spyad pa bshad pa med// gnyis med ye shes dang ldan na// bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// yon tan gter gyur rdo rje 'chang la
7a3(rgyud 'grel): da rdo rje gsum gyis rtag tu gus byas la// skye ba'i rgya mtsho sdig pa'i rlabs dag mang ldan pa la grub gyur gcig pu mchog/ gsang ba'i yon tan 'byung 'gyur dri ma bral zhing don kun sgrub cing rab tu sbyin par byed pa yi// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lam dang
7a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i sgrub po blo dang ldan pas dad nas brtsam par bya// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pas dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba dang brtul zhugs dang de kho
7a5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid nges par bstan pa zhes pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i// cung zad sdus pa'i lam nyid las// gsang ba las byung sgrub pa'i thabs// de las yang dag bshad par bya// phyi rol de nyid bya ba'i lam// shin tu ring ba kun
7a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs la// lugs bcas rnal 'byor rim pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin bdag gis brjod// slob dpon phal cher 'di skad brjod// dpal ldan 'dus pa mngangs chen gyi// rgyud kyi sdud par byed pa po// dpa' bo 'jig rten dbang phyug zer// bla ma zhabs kyi
7b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gyis// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sdud pa po// gzhan ngag yod pa ma yin zhes// bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed// rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs rje che// gsung ba po de brjod pa'ang de/ de las gzhan dag yod min pas// bde chen las
7b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gsung ba med// 'di skad thos pa'i tshig gang dang // bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gnas pa// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kun la bstan pa yin dpal ldan bde chen mgon po yis// bzhugs zhes bya ba'i
7b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig bzang por// ji ltar bzang po gang bstan pa// de bzhin bdag gis bcung zhig brjod// dus gcig mchog tu mdor bstan pa// gang tshe gtso bos gsungs pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud bden don// bde ba chen po bdag nyid yin// /
7b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyis// rgyud don bden pa de thos nas// 'dar zhing 'jigs pa dang ldan pas// dbang phyug mchog la de nyid zhus// dpa' bo chos nyid 'di lta bu// gtso bo gsung bar dka' ba gsung // sangs rgyas kun kyang thams
7b5(rgyud 'grel): cad du// shin tu 'jigs pa skyed byed pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// shin tu gsang ba 'byed par byed// chos kun mnyam nyid gcig pa nyid// gang yin gtso bo khyed kyis gsungs// 'di skad brjod par gyur pa na// sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad
7b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang / 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur nas kyang // byang chub sems ni thugs la bzhag/ e ma'o gsang ba las gsang ba// rdo rje theg pa'i bshad pa 'di// ngo bo med cing dag gyur la// gang las dpe yang yod min pas// sangs rgyas thams cad brgyal gyur pa//
8a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpas de gzigs nas// bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyang // ting 'dzin bzang po la gnas nas// de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i snyoms 'jug sbyor ba mdzad// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyi//
8a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam po'i gsung gis gsung bar mdzad// kye kye rgyal ba thams cad gzigs// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin// gang du lus ngag sems med pa// der ni gzugs su rab tu mthong // byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba yis// ji srid 'bad pra
8a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas shis pa// chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid// shes rab rang gi dngos de srid// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis// spros pa med cing dag pa las// 'di dag thams cad rnam par 'phrul// mchog tu shis shing
8a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag gang // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// brjod min kun la khyab par gnas// thams cad de yi rnam 'phrul yin// bzang po de nyid gnas pa yang // mkha' dbyings zhes bya'i sgrib bral la// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis//
8a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi bde 'byung byed// rnam dog shes rab lus las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi ba// lha rdzas chos 'byung mi 'gyur ba// blo yis de ni bdag gis brten// e'i cha byad bzang po la// dbus su baM gis rnam par brgyan// bde
8a6(rgyud 'grel): ba kun gyi gnas gyur pas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa// de phyir de ni bshad par bya// dpa' bo bde chen 'di skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gsungs// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs
8b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul dag gis// gnas shing dngos grub bzang ster ba// shes rab ces bya'i ming gis gnas// de la gnas pa gang yin pa// b+ha ga zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// dag pa'i de nyid ces bya ste// don dam pa de bdag gis brten// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // /
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i sku gsung rdo rje nyid// dag pa de la nga gnas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod// chos kyi 'byung gnas spangs pa yis// chos gnas dag pa gzhan dag med// gang la sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa'o// dag
8b3(rgyud 'grel): pa de nyid gnas med pas// 'jig pa nyid du ma byed cig/ chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid// rdo rje btsun mo nyid la gnas// dud 'gro la sogs 'gro ba kun// de las thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal bar ci yi phyir na yang // khyod ni 'jigs pa nyid
8b4(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur// sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba// de ni de yi chos nyid mchog/ snying po'i ye shes mtha' gcig pu// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nyid 'di skad thos 'gyur te// sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas nas// bye ba kun gyi bstod byed cing //
8b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal gzugs kyi 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can kun la phan ston pa'i// snyan pa'i tshig rnams smra byed pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po ni// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gtso yongs dag pa// rdo rje theg pa skor mdzad
8b6(rgyud 'grel): cing // 'gyur ba med cing snang ba med// gnas med de nyid bshad du gsel// dpa' bo nyon mongs mtsho tshon las// rgyal bas ji ltar nges grol ba'i// de nyid mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nyid kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ bzhugs zhes bya ba'i
9a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi 'gor// e baM tshig gis rnam brgyan pa// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// bde gshegs dngos grub 'byung 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang // de ltar gsol 'debs gsan gyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
9a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la// go 'phang mchog ni gsung bar mdzad// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la// rdo rje snying po kun bsdus pa// shin tu gsang ba phyed mdzad nas// rdo rje thugs kyi bstan pa ltar// 'di ltar rnam par gnas pa bzhin// de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya//
9a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// gsal por thams cad shes byas nas// dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa// bzang po de nas bshad par bya// rgyud kyi dang por rnam gnas pa// snying po las ni snying po mchog/ de nyid bde chen mgon po yis// gsang
9a4(rgyud 'grel): ba de nyid ces byar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sems can kun gyi bde 'byung ba// gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dbang rgyal po// dpal ldan 'dus par rnam par gnas// e baM rnam dag yi ge la// khams gsum po kun gus phyag 'tshal
9a5(rgyud 'grel): gang de dpal ldan 'gro mgon gyis// phyag rgya'i mchog gyur brtags pa nyid// de ni shes rab ces byar grags// thog ma bar mtha' dri ma med// ye shes rdo rje gsum 'byung ba// kun rdzob gzugs su rnam par gnas// sems can rjes su bzung ba'i phyir//
9a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya zhes byar grags// mi mo'i lus la brten nas ni// sems can kun la phan par mdzad// kun khyab dag pa thams cad pa// shes rab lha mo bla na meng // gcig pu bzang po 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can mgon gyis bstan pa yin//
9b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings po byung nyams dpa' na// sna tshol sa thugs rje can gnas pa// de la b+ha ga zhes brjod dang // a tha nas bya'i yig gnyis la// sras ngag yod kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid gnas// de phyir de nyid mdor bstan dag
9b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas par bstan pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rje btsun gyi nang na gnas pa yang // de'i gzhung lugs nyams pa smras pa las shin tu spras pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid dbang du byas nas brjod par bya'o//
9b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brtan pa dang // g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su byed pa'i gzugs can thugs rdo rje'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi brgyan pa'i skur gyur
9b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus po e baM zhes bya ba ma tshogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nges par ston to// don dam pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha'i gzugs de nyid rgyud kyi
9b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi go rims kyi nges par rdzogs par gyur nas di rab tu ston par mdzad de/ dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u las/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi ming brjod pa'i mtha' na/ ji ltar chos
9b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi ngo bo mngon par bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang zhes bya ba la sogs dbang du byas nas brjod de/ 'di ni re zhig dang po lha'i rnal 'byor yin te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i gzug
10a1(rgyud 'grel): tsun+ya yin pa'i phyir ro// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur nas/ dam tshig dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzlas pa'i tshi ga'i lugs sngon du 'gro bas/ sal sogs pa'i ma bzhin rigs dang lhan cig na ma kha khams su/
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas nas 'dod pa'i yonan+da tan lnga'i longs spyod kyi rlonas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du meng nga'i dung 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can gyi rim pa ma lus pa'i byin gyis brdabs pa'i sngags kyi sgyu mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can/ bde ba mchog gis
10a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i dpal pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgra thos pa na/ brgyal bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ e baM zhes bya ba la sogs
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bas dron dam phyi'i dri kho nyid gang yin pa de 'dir brjod par bya'o// rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa// sbas pa de phyir bshad par bya// rdo rje btsun mo las byung ba// e baM rnam dag yi ge nyid// e baM na mkha'i khams su brjod// ma ya phyag rgyar rjes su thob//
10a5(rgyud 'grel): pang zhig de ni ston byed pa// thos pa zhes bya 'dir brjod do// rtog med kun mkhyen ye shes nyid// dus cig pa yong de yin no// b+ho ga'i gzugs can gang yin te// na mkha'i khams zhes bya bar brjod// dus gcig na zhes gang bstan pa// de mdor bstan pa
10a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do// namakha'i khams zhes bde 'byung ba// gang yin bdag gis der brten to// sna tshogs dril bu rnga yab phreng // dril bu rin chen gyis nyer brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bzang po// gnas kyi mchog der mchod par byed// bcom ldan
10b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das zhes nyer bstan pa// gtso bo bdag po thugs nyid do// rdo rje btsun mo zhes brjod pa// shes rab rgyal ba kun dngos te// thams cad ces bya sgra brjod pa// mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs// nga yi sku gsung thugs gang yin// thugs nyid du ni
10b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas// rnam dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// dngos po kun gyi ngo bo yis// mchog tu dga' bas rnam rol cing // e yi tshe byad bzang po la// dbus su baM gis rnam par brgya ma// dwer ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gnas
10b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab las byung zhi ba nyid// der ni sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // de nyid du ni rnam par gnas// ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi// mtha' med bskal pa bye ba ru// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bcos pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor de//
10b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang // dpal dang ldan de de na bzhugs// na mkha'i khams zhes bya ba der// til gyi gang bu gang zhing mthong // gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// de bzhin gshegs pas yongs gang ba// yi ge de yi de kho na// brten par byas
10b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thabs nyid kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur// de ltar bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig/ don dam nyid du rnam par gnas// gzhan du de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i// nyams su myong ba sku mi 'gyur// /
10b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs sam gzhan yang rung // dpal ldan bde chen rgyal po ni// 'dus pa zhes bya'i byed po gang // de ni e baM 'di rab gnas// e baM zhes sogs rnam ngag dang // shru ta zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// gsang ba'i tshig gnas nges par
11a1(rgyud 'grel): yang rtargyud kyi dang por brjod par bya// 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yis// de ni byed pa por 'dod do// 'di ni yi ge gnyis po ni// rgyud kyi dang por med mi 'dod// mchog tu dri med go 'phang ni// de ltar rnam dgra shes
11a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// dpal ldan 'dus par gang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi blo// dngos grub mchog gyur der shes nas// rgyud las khyab par brjod pa bya// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhin gsungs pa// dam tshig spyod pa ston pa po//
11a3(rgyud 'grel): dag cing brjod du med pa yi// byang chub sems ni thams cad du// rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyud thams cad// le ma nyer ston par rnam par gnas// chos 'byung yi ge ni nyid du// brjod du med par rnam par gnas// ngi yi dbye ba mtha' med
11a4(rgyud 'grel): bas/ sna tshogs khyab nas rnam par gnas// 'di ni sbran pa 'dra ba yi// de yi dbye ba kun spangs bya// de ni rnam dag ngo bo nyid// sgrub pa'i thabs ni bdag gis brjod// dngos po med pa de nyid ni// thabs bcas pad+mo rdo rje skyeb// dag
11a5(rgyud 'grel): bral mchog dga'i bar du nyid du// mtshon nas glang ni gri rnam gnas par// rtag d+hA der gtang yid nyid kyis// gdu zhig der gnas grub par 'gyur// sgrub po sgom byA ldan pa yis// sgra yi ye shes nyams myong 'gyur// don dam
11a6(rgyud 'grel): tshim yi ge gsum dang sngon pa'i rgyad kyi ngam pa'i don nges par bsgrub par pol gi sang bgrub pa zhes bya ba dpas rdo rje sems dpa' mnyis par bya ba las 'tshugs pa'i tshig nges par bstan pa zhes bya skye'i chu
11b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsung ba bshad par bya// shes rab thabs ni rnam sgom pas// thugs ni rdo rje dran pa nyid// gsang ba las kyang gsang ba mchog/ rang gi lus la gnas pa yi// dag pa gang zhig shes gyur nas// gnas bzung por ni gnas par/
11b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de ni bdug gis yang dag bshad// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i// dngos grub bzang po sgrub pa'i phyir// mkha' dbyings lha yi gzhal yas na// ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gnas// bzang po rang gi skyed byed pa// thog ma/
11b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus mthar dri ma med// dang po'i las can sems can rnams// mtshon cing yid ches byed pa'o// mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun sbyor ba'i// re gau las ngo mtshar chen po nyid// bde ba gang zhig 'byung 'gyur te// mchog tu dga'o bar byed pa'o// de
11b4(rgyud 'grel): zad nas ni dga' bral te// gang gi mtha' na dga' bral can// rang gi ngo bo bstan med pa'o// bdag nyid cung zhig 'byung bar 'byung // dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// khyab cing rang bzhin med pa
11b5(rgyud 'grel): yi// rtogs pa de ni go 'phang mchog/ lha rdzas kun bzang zhes bya ba// dga' bral mtha' na rnam par gnas// mchog 'di sgrub po rnams kyi ni// grol ba'i gnas su rab tu grags// dpal ldan 'dus pa de nyid gang // bde gshe
11b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pas gang gsungs pa// dngos med mchog tu rnam par dag/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa// rang bzhin dag pa de nyid ni// bdag gis rgyas par bstan par bya// na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil
12a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom par bya// zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan par bya'o// gang zhig mkha' dbyings steng du rin chen 'gyur// bde ba kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par gnas// dbus su yon tan gyis brgyan sems gyur
12a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ \u0f7fde 'dir skyes bu'i sna rtse zhes byas bstan// rtog pa dang bcas sems zhes bya bas der// zla ba'i gzugs dang sangs rgyas sku yis khyab// longs spyod rdzogs sku bde ba'i ngo bo nyid// kun rdzob byang chub sems zhes de la brjod// kun rdzob
12a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni nub gyur cing // der ni dga' bral zhes bya 'byung gyur nas// mnyam med sprul pa'i sku yi brgyan gyur cing // sangs rgyas sna tshogs du mo spro bar byed// gnas skabs gang la dga' bral zhes bya ba'i// skad cig b+ha ga'i dbus su
12a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung 'gyur te// yungs kar zhes bya'i ming gi rnam gnas pa// de la sprul pa'i sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs// bde ba'i dngos 'dir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang // sprul pa'i sku yang 'gags shing bzhugs gyur pa// bdag med rdo rje rim gyis cho ga
12a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// kun rtog rnam par rtog pa nges par spangs// bdag med rdo rje shin tu dri ma med// de nas dga' bral bde ba rnam par spangs// mar la mor bzhag bzhin du skad cig gis// byang chub gnas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas// der ni dga' bral bde
12a6(rgyud 'grel): ba son gyur nas// bdag med rdo rje shin tu brtan par bzhugs// der ni brjod med shes byar gang gnas pa// rnam dag byang chub go 'phang kun 'gro ba// shes bya'i bdag nyid dpag med mdangs ldan pa'i// de nyid bdag nyid lhan cig gzugs bsgom bya//
12b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bral zhes bya gang gis brjod min pa// de yi mtshon rdzogs bsam mi khyab pa'i gzugs// kun tu dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid// yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang zhes pa// so so rang rig lugs bzhin rig gyur pas// don dam rnam dag rgyal ba
12b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sku// byang chub dam pa mchog gtso de nas bsgom// bzang po bde ba'i sar gyur kun 'gro ba// gsang gsum dri med rin chen de nyid bcas// rtag tu sems can don du lugs rig pas// dbang po gnyis sbyor mchog tu rab brtags nas//
12b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer du ma de nas spro bar bya// gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo khams gsum 'di// dngos po rang bzhin med par rnam par dpyad// de nyid de ni bzung ba la// 'bad pa'i thabs gzhan spyod min pas// bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// shes nas blo dang
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas bsgom// bdag nyid dri med zhi ba yi// de nyid de dang ldan gyur pas// las kyi phyag rgyas bsgom pa yang // 'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// las kyi phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// bden pa gsung bas mngon
12b5(rgyud 'grel): sum du// 'di 'dra'i bsgom pa gang gsungs pa// dang po'i las can sems can la// las kyi phyag rgya gang spangs nas// byang chub sems ni rab bstan pa// gzhan gyi mtshon pas mi 'thob ste// dang po'i las pas rig bya ba// thog ma bar mtha' dri med
12b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gnas te gzhan du nus ma yin// de lta'i de nyid mchog zhi ba// mkha' dbyings zhes byar gnas pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor dang // yang dag rang bzhin gyis thob 'gyur// kun tu 'gro ba de nyid ni// dang po'i las pas bzung ba'i phyir//
13a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings pho brang babang po ru// sgrub po mchog gis thob par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das mchog gang yin te// bde ba'i ngo bo dngos med pa// de ni phyag rgya la brten nas// rang gi rig pa'i ngo bor gnas// shes rab thabs dag rnam
13a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas// de ltar de nyid shes byas la// chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// ngo mtshar mchog gyur rdo rje can// de yi tshe na sgrub par bya// rang lus thabs dang ldan pa 'am// yang na las kyi phyag rgyas so// las kyi phyag
13a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pad+mar gnas// mtshon du med par gang gnas pa// gong nas gong du bsgoms pa yis// zhi dpal rdo rje 'dzin par mtshon// de ni bdag gis thams cad bstan// gzhan yang bdag gis bstan par bya// las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas// de nyid ldan
13a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya med par lha rdzas nyid// de bzhin sgrub pos 'thob par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog/ mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya// las kyi phyag rgya khyo rgyu can// ye shes phyag rgya yang de bzhin// rnam rtog mang ba spang
13a5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom bya// rnam par g.yengs pa kun 'byung ba'i// bud med phyag rgya rnam spangs la// rang lus thabs dang ldan pa yi// phyag rgya chen po bsten par bya// rang gi reg pa'i lha rdzas de// phyag rgya chen po mchog tu dag/ tha mal
13a6(rgyud 'grel): lus la brten nas gnas// shes rab chung bas mthong mi 'gyur// mi 'gyur ba yi rang lus de// mchog gcig gis ni shes par 'gyur// bla ma'i bka' drin gnang ba la// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// rtswa shing 'khri shing la sogs la// kun tu
13b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par gyur pa yang // mi yi thabs dang bral ba yis// me ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin// thabs dang bral na nam du yang // lha rdzas yon tan kun 'byung ba// gnyug ma'i lus la gnas na yang // shes rab de bzhin mthong mi 'gyur// ji ltar bud
13b2(rgyud 'grel): shing khu ba dang // til la til mar ji bzhin pa// de bzhin lus la thams cad du// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gnas// lha rdzas mchog de thams cad la// rnam par gnas par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis skyed byed pa// shes rab lha mo
13b3(rgyud 'grel): bla na med// khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag/ gang gis thams cad gsal byed pa// mya ngan 'das pa gnas dngos kyi// thog ma par mtha' rnam par mdzes// de ltar shes nas 'bad pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin zhi ba// rdzogs pa'i
13b4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dbang phyug mchog gis khyab par 'gyur// gang zhig sems la 'dod gyur pa// de ni de nas bsgom par bya// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu stsol// de dang lhan cig tshol byed pas/
13b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bdag gis rtag tu rig/ nyin dang mtshan du bsgom 'gyur na// 'di ni thob 'gyur the tshom med// smyon pa'i gzugs la brten nas ni// bsal por skye bo smod byed cing // thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// byang chub yangs pa bsgom par
13b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// mchog tu mya ngan 'das gsungs pa// dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// rang lus de nyid blo ldan gyis// de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// dngos grub kun sbyin sgrub pa'i thabs// phung po lnga yi bdag lus nyid// ji ltar gsang ba gnas gyur pa//
14a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang dag bshad par bya// phyag rgya chen po rtag byal pas// dpa' bo ji ltar rdzogs 'gyur ba// mchog tu gyur pa'i rang gi lus// shin tu gsang ba bdag gis bshad// blo ldan dngos po mi bsgom zhing // dngos med
14a2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol ring du spangs// gcig gis rtag par 'dzin gyur cing // gzhan dag gis ni stong nyid du'o// rtag dang chad pa'i sbyor ba las// mchog tu 'dzin pa zad pa gang // ye shes ci zhig 'byung 'gyur ba// thog me dbus mtha' dri ma med// gtso bo rtag pa
14a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu zhi// rgyu dang dpe ni rnam spangs pa// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// rtag tu 'byung zhing 'gyur ba med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// der gnas bsgom dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas kyis/
14a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang spyod yul min// de mi bgrod dang bgrod bya med// bgrod par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med// sgom dang bsgom bya sgom pa po// don dam par na yod ma yin// dpe las 'das shing brjod du med// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// mtshan ma
14a5(rgyud 'grel): med cing rdul dang bral// mya ngan 'das zhes ngo la bshad// gang la mchog ces brjod bya ste// phyag rgya chen po mngon par gnas// lha rdzas longs spyod grol ster ba// mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog/ bzang po'i gnas de sems can la// skal pa
14a6(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin rab tu bstan// gcig nyid gnyisu rnam par gyur// bsam pa'i dbye bas mchog nyid de// lha rdzas mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs// ngag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// bud med skyes pa sogs gzugs kyis// thams cad du ni rnam par
14b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dbang po las 'das zhi ba gang // rjod med kun tu 'gro ba mchog/ 'phel zhing 'grib las rnam grol ba// dpal ldan pade chen zhes brjod pa// cung zad rdzas su 'du shes gang // thams cad de las kun tu 'byung // khams gsum pa yis lam
14b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po// kun tu de ni rnam par gnas// de ni dngos grub sa bon te// dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog ste// bde ba can zhes mngon par brjod// lha dang lha min mor bcas pa// thams cad 'di las nges
14b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'byung // khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag/ thams cad bde ba nyid du gnas// gang gis gzugs ni shes min zhing // gang zhig tshig sa dang blo spangs lnga// sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das// blo yi yul las gang 'das pa// de ni 'jig
14b4(rgyud 'grel): rten las 'das pa// mchog tu bden pa'i gzugs gang zhig/ rang gis dbang gis 'jug 'gyur ba// chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor bar gyur// gsang sngags bye ba grangs med kyang // de la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// bden pa gsung ba'i lung gis 'gal
14b5(rgyud 'grel): bden par gyur pa'i rim ston pa'i// bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// de ltar de nges shes byas la// thabs gang gis ni de yi de sa// mchog tu brjod med gang thob pa// b+h+yo wAn de nyid rang lus la// sngags pas de nyid sgrub par bya// dngos blo med
14b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bsres pa// tshig sems dang ldan pa yi// thabs pazang po dang ldan byas na so// yang dang yang du nges par bya// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pas// dus mi 'ong por 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu sgom pa'i 'i sbyi ring// chogs
15a1(rgyud 'grel): yas na gang shes dang // 'dud pa'i yon+da tanA lnga ldan pa'i// dag pa'i bdag nyid gang sgom bya// gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i// dngos grub nges ni gdon mi zla// las kyi phyag rgya ldan pa 'am// yang na phyag rgya chen po
15a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs gyur pa// 'di ni chos nyid mchog yin no// snying po'i ye shes gcig bsdus pa// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bdag med gnas 'di ma gtogs pa'i// rnam dag dngos grub gzhan dag med// rnam par mi
15a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog dmigs med pa// gang las sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba'i// shes rab lha mo bla na med// 'di ni pha rol zhes byar brjid// gal te shes nas sgoms gyur na// sems can kun gyi grol ster 'gyur// sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis//
15a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i de nyid gang bsgoms pa// rang bzhin 'od gsol rnam dag pas// bdag nyid rdo rje kun las skyes// mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// tha mal pa yi lus spangs nus// lha rdzas nga rgyal ldan yid kyis//
15a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang yang dag ldan pa dang // ting 'dzin mchog la rnam gnas nas// pad+ma rdo rje tshig bzhin du// de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// gang zhig phyag rgya chen ldan pas// bde ba chen po myong gyur pa// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog bzang po// de ni brjod par nug
15a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// rang gis rig pa'i de nyid de// gzhan gyis brjod par nus mi 'gyur// gus dang bsgom pas rtogs 'gyur gyi// de ni gzhan du rtogs mi nug// de nyid shes nas nyin mtshan du// gus pas bsgom par bya ba yin// mya ngan 'das pa'i go
15b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phang mchog/ bdo ba zho ba bla mong dor// dor na gus pa'i stobs stong drung // bsgom pa'o stobs kyis glang sprul pa// ngor ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o gzugs// kun dga' las byung ci yang mchog/ spro zhong spyang par byed pa can// gsal por yud kyis byung
15b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba// sA 'ogs zlas sting sgra 'd-i// rludang rgya min snang bar byed// de nyid bskams pa'i stobyas nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab drangangos zhi ba// sbyini mengs kun las rnam grol zhing // mtshan rnams kun gyis nom brgyan pa/ skyong nying se shes la
15b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes// gnyis med mchog tu sgri ba nyid// rnam pa kun tu mchog sngon zhing // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par sbyangs// rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos// gsal zhing rlung bzhin dri ma sbed// sgra dang d+hi dang ri las 'das// de bzhin reg pa rnam pa
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs// ting 'dzin ste shes mig nyid kyis// mchog gcig pu ri mamyong bar 'gyur// dbang po grib ma'i sgyu 'dra yis// 'du byeng bzang po dang snun pa// me yis zag pa bsregs pa bzhin// nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol ba// rnam pa
15b5(rgyud 'grel): ga sas nAms ni// ye shrIs rnabs kyi phreng ba sgrus// dbang po rje gzhu dang 'dra b+ha'i Sh+Tha// de nyid bsgom smra bsdu thob par gyur// rna la 'byor bsgom pa'i nus pa dang // dam+b+ha tsa~Mg rnams ni bskyung byas pas// rdul ba yis kyang
15b6(rgyud 'grel): maung pa'i// de 'dra'i gdug pa ni zab par 'gyur/ shing du lus ngag sems med pa'i// senas gang kun 'gro mchog gyur ba'i// de ni yang dag bstan dab gas// rang bzhin bsgom par gyu la stog/ ma pa myong /
16a1(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o zhi ba dbang po las// e ma'o mchog tu zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin// lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid kyis// rim gyis 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas go 'phang bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nas spyod pa spyad
16a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// nyon mongs kun dang bral ba'i gnas// brjod dang brjod bya nam sbyangs la// 'bad pa nyid kyi mngon sum du// sgrub pa pos ni yang rang yang // brtan pa'i sems kyis nges par yang // gsang ba'i spyod pa spyad par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim po'i rna
16a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la// lha rdzas gar dang rgod sogs kyis// ji ltar skyo ba mi skye bar// sangs rgyas spyod pa la mos pas// brtul zhugs can gyis gsang ba spyad// brtul zhugs dang ldan der gnas nas// der gtad bsgom pa dang
16a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// nyon mongs thams cad mthar byas la// go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par bya// rgyun tu mchog tu gsang ba ste// blo ma'i zhabs la rab gnas pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub bzang ster ba// de ni thams cad bdag gis bshad// don dam
16a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
16a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i las pa'i sems can gyis// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa nyid// cung zhig rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid can// de nas nga ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal bar// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gang gsungs pa// gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis//
16b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya ba bzhi po nyid// dang po yi ge dgod par bya// bskyeng ba'i rim pa la gnas pas// sgrub po'i dbang pos bsgom bya ba// gnyis pa rang gi rang bzhin nyid// gsum pa bzang po mchog gyur pa// ye shes phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// bzhi pa gong mar
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gang gsungs pa// phyag rgya chen por rnam par bsgom// de ltar de nyid bzhi po ni// 'di dag la ni yang dag gnas/ bsgom pa dag gis gang bstan pa// de dag bdag gis so sor bshad// yi ge dgong ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom par bya ba gang gsungs
16b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sems can dang po'i las can rnams// gzhug par bya phyir gang gsungs pa// ji lta ba bzhin rnam gnas pa'i// dang po re zhig bstan par bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam nyid du// gcig nyid rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi// ye shes
16b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dge ba nyid// ji ltar bstan par shes gyur nas// rtog tu gnas te 'dir bshad bya// gong ma gong ma'i rim nyid kyis// thugs kyi rdo rje gang gsungs pa// yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor ba yi// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid bdag/ bzang po namakha'i mtshan nyid
16b5(rgyud 'grel): can/ kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi// kun 'gro'i ye shes rnam dag pa// thog ma par mtha' dri ma med// chos rnams kyis ni ngo bo gang // so so'i gzugs su gang gnas pa// bongs med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'bad pa nyid kyi so sor brtag/ spros pa
16b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las grol ba'i// gzugs gang mchog ni zhi ba nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo shes// ye shes 'di la 'di rab grags// gnas bzang po der gnas nas ni// nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs la// sems can rnams kyi don bya gang // gzug
17a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog nyid dmigs par bya// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi// shes rang dang ni bcas pa'i gzugs// gsal po rnam pas byung gyur pa// mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs//
17a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// dang zhing skyon bral dri ma med// phyag rgya chen por rjes rig bya// gzugs de las ni 'byung 'gyur ba// de yi gzugs brnyan ltar byed pa// sgyu ma'i rjes grub bzang po gang // rnal 'byor phyag rgya gzugs ldan pa'i//
17a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gzugs brnyan yid kyi rang bzhin nyid// yon tan mtha' med 'byung 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mkhyen pa'i// dpal ldan me long ming can du// ye shes de la brjod par bya// dngos po med pa'i
17a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin du// der ni 'gog pa'i ye shes gang // de yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes brjod do// rgyas pa spyan zhes bya ba gang // lha rdzas bud med dkyil 'khor ro// 'bad pas so sor rtogs gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa
17a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas// bdag med gnas kyi rnal 'byor pa// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can// lha rdzas nam kha'i khams kyi ngor// sang sgra rgyas kun gyi pho brang mchog/ sgyu mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor gcig byas// ji srid de la rtogs 'gyur bas// rtog pa cung zhig/
17a6(rgyud 'grel): bskul gyur pa// de srid de ni mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag/ srid gsum gnas na gang gnas la gang zhig gnas pa de dag kun// til gyi gang bu bzhin 'dir mthong // gad+hA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// de bzhin gshegs
17b1(rgyud 'grel): pas yongs gang ba// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'od chen po// bzang po de ni mthong gyur nas// na mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas bzang por// rnal 'byor 'di ni brtag par bya// der ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// da ltar bzhugs dang gang 'das dang // gang
17b2(rgyud 'grel): dag 'byung bar gyur pa dag/ de dag kun gyi gnas mchog ni/ dag cing dang pa dri med de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchod// ye shes de ni mdor bsdus na// so sor rtog pa zhes byar brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du// 'bad pas
17b3(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa nyid// de yi phyi nas nyams len pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul pas// lha yi rnal 'byor kun 'gengs shing // mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// sa la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// byang chub sems ni yang dag spro// gang 'dod
17b4(rgyud 'grel): lha yi rnal 'byor ni// der ni nges par sgrub par bya// rtag dang mi skyong rin chen tshe// rigs la sogs par gang gnas pa// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// bzang po'i rgyan dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya chen po
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes rig pa// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar bas// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa'i// ye shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spros// bya ba nan tan ye shes zhes// mchog tu gyur pa de la brjod// gang la rgyal ba rnams
17b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bas// gang du phyag rgya byin rlabs pas// ting 'dzin lnga po 'dir gnas pas// gang zhig yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi// ye shes zhes ni 'di rab grags// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas par// de yi khyad
18a1(rgyud 'grel): par brjod pa yin// lha dgod rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// khams drug pa dag mnyam ldan pa'i// rgyud las gsungs pa'i 'khor los sgyur// rim gyi yum gyur bzhi po dang // khro bo sems dpa' de dang
18a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// 'khor bcas pA yi byang chub sems// bcu drug dag dang mnyam ldan pa'i// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // de bzhin dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yin// rtag
18a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mo skyong rin chen mIs// rigs la sogs par yang dag glanas/ de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// rnam par rtog pa'i rgyas gang ba'i// dang po'i las can sems can gyi// bsgom par bye bar gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo'i rim par bsgom
18a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa// 'di ni phyi rol zhes bshad de// yi ge dgong pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dngo bo nyid du gang gnas pa'o// sems can dang po'i las can la// las kyi phyag rgya bsgoms pa yi// rnam par gnas pa'i bang gnas gang // gong ma mchog
18a5(rgyud 'grel): gi go 'phang yin// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu bajug/ de nyid dpalnga ldan 'dus par ni// rdo rje 'dzin pas mchog tu gsungs// bskyed pa'i rim+b+ha pa nyud+ma ldan byas// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// 'di ni bsgom
18a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis bskye// dzo najo bo yon zhes grags// gsum pa deni bstan pa ste// nang gi go bsang bsgrim pa yi mo// rnam pa kun ni mchog ldan pani// yo gas phyag rgya 'i btag pa'o// bani pa gong na med pa'i rgyu// mngon par byang chub byed
18b1(rgyud 'grel): boHphyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa// de yi gong na gzhan med pa'o// dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing // 'byung ba'i spyod pa sgras gyur pa// zhi zhing grub pa myur ster la// bla ma'i zhal las rab gnas pa'o// gcig min du ma ma yin zhing // rlabs med
18b2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba med pa dang // thams cad kyis ni bde gnas pa// mchog tu dga' ba byed pa po// rang sems tsam du shes par bya// nyon mongs tshogs ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // dam pa'i shes rab gyur pa'i lus// de ltar rgyud kyi rim shes nas// lha yi rnal
18b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mchog nyid dang // gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis// drang po min pas gang 'ongs pa// de dag thams cad nges btang la// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen por 'bad pa yis// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// grub pa thams
18b4(rgyud 'grel): cad rab sbyin zhing // thabs kyi mnog dang bcas par ni// de dag bsgom pa dang ldan na// tshe 'di nyid las grub par 'gyur// glang zhig sems ni bla na med pas// skye ba med par gang rtogs pa// de yi dngos med shes rab ste// thabs kyi rab tu bskul
18b5(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid// de ltar de nyid shes pa la// phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom// de nas thebs dang bcas gyur pas// gang 'dod pa yi brtul zhugs bya// sangs rgyas gos med zhi ba 'am// de bzhin nor gyi bdag po 'am// yang na brtul zhugs chen po
18b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ yang ni sems la 'dod pa'o// bshad par gyur pa shes byas la// brtul zhugs ma yin shes pa nyid// blo dang ldan pas shes bya ba// rgyu las gzhan dag bshad pa yi// dor ba'i brtul zhugs kun mi bya// mchog tu gyur pa yin par
19a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// de las yid la gang 'dod pa// spyad pa med par spyad par bya// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes su 'brel gyur pa// lam mchog dpe med 'bad pas shes byas la// brtan pa'i blo yi dag pa de nyid gcig/ phyi rol dri
19a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ma lus spangs byas nas// bde ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan gnyug mo'i gzugs// 'odu 'dzi dri ma spangs la bsgom par bya// ye shes rang bzhin rjes 'brel nyin mtshan du// sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur bstan pa nyid// dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sems// rtag tu byang chub la bzhugs bsgom pa'i sems 'brel ba// dri ma ma lus zad par gyur pa yis// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni spang bar bya// bde ba'o go 'phang mchog gyur brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom// rtag tu goms par
19a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i rnal 'byor drung // bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// dri ma'i rab rib spangs dag mthong ba bzang // gcig tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs yon tan rgya'i gzhir gyur ri'am khyim stong ngam// skyed tshal rnying dang brag phug dur khrod dag gam sa phug nyams
19a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' 'am// de ltar dri med byas pa'i sa phyogs ngag tu bzang po mtshon cing bzung // yul gyi bde bskyed byed de nyid rin chen rdo rje canA~M gyi 'du 'dzi spangs la bsgom// rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyang // de nyid lam la rab chags pas// thabs dang bcas
19a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// don 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// bskyed pa'i rim pa lam gyis ni// gzhon dag tu yang 'gyur ba yin// skye ba du ma dag gis kyang // 'dir ni gcig gis 'byung bar bshad// de ltar the tshom med shes nas// shes rab
19b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi bsgom pa yis// phyi rol rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// bya ba'i bye brag yongs spangs la// dbul ldan 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bcas// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab ster bya// thabs bzang drug dang ldan pa yi// blo ldan gsang ba grub byar spyad//
19b2(rgyud 'grel): yul dang dus dang gza' rnams dang // rgyu skar phyi rol dkyil 'khor rnams// med par gsang ba rdo rje can// sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bshad par bya// nges pa brtul zhugs gso sbyong sogs// yi ge brjod pa'i bsgom pa yis// 'di ltar dngos grub gang
19b3(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa// spyod pa dka' bas brtags pa yin// yi ge brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid// kha dog dbye bas mtshon bye ba// sems can kun gyi gsang dbang gis// dpal ldan gsang bar gang gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor dag ni gang gsungs pa// rigs nyid
19b4(rgyud 'grel): so sor so so dang // phyag rgya'i dbye ba sna tshogs dang // de bzhin sngags kyi dbye ba rnams// mchod dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // rigs kyi dbye ba du ma nyid// ting 'dzin dbye ba phye ba yi// lha rnams su ni brtags pa dang // dus nges pa yi bye brag rnams//
19b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // sbyor ba du ma nyid dang ni// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma rnams// sna tshogs gzugs kyi gang gnas pa// 'khor bar rab tu 'ching byed pa'i// khams gsum pa yi bstan pa'i lam// de
19b6(rgyud 'grel): kun dngos po med gyur pa'i// ye shes mchog gi rnam 'phrul yin// rtog med rnam par dag pa ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu kun tu song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin gzhan yang yod ma yin// dang po'i rnal 'byor ngo bo yis// ji srid
20a1(rgyud 'grel): kun lnga rnam par spyod// chos dang chos min mtshan nyid kyi// thams cad mngon du brtags pa can// bdag med gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji skyid brtan par ma brtags pa'o// rnam par mi rtog gnas pa med// dag
20a2(rgyud 'grel): cing rang bzhin dri ma med// spring ba'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa// khams gsum 'di dgra thams cad nyid// lam gyi so sor brtags byas nas// phung po'i bden pa yod ma yin// su zhig gis ni so sor rtog/ 'dir ni gang la brtag par bya//
20a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas de nyid de kho na// ji srid bar du brtag byas pa// de srid thams cad 'od gsal te// rnam dag rang bzhin dri ma meng // dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing // spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs min na// skye bo
20a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis smos ci dgos// rtag dang chad pa las grol zhing // kun 'gro mchog tu zhi ba nyid// dngos med snang ba med pa yi// byang chub sems dpas phyag byas pa'o// yon tan med cing nga rgyal med// mtshan ma med cing sgrib pa med //
20a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grib dang 'phel las rnam grol ba// ngag gi spyod yul dag las 'das// de la 'gro dang 'ong ba dang // 'dir ni 'gro ba po 'ga' med// sgrom dang sgom po sgom bya dag/ don dam par nu yod ma yin// de nyid mchog gyur gcig pu nyid//
20a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// dbye ba sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// bye ba snyed du rab rgyas pa// bzang po kun 'gro rnam dag ste// ming gcig nyid kyi glanas pa min// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis// khams gsum kun tu rab tu khyag/
20b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rig byed smra ba tshangs pa zer// sangs rgyas pa rnams byang chub mchog/ gos med pa rnams srog ces zer// grangs can rig pa can la sogs// dbye ba gang zhig rnam brtag pa// de dag brjod par ga la nus// sna tshogs
20b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la khyab gnas nas// rnam pa sna tshogs ngo bo rnams// des ni smra bar nus ma yin// bzang po'i dbye bas gang gnas pa// yang dag mtha' nyid du mar bstan// kun mkhyen ye shes mi rtog pa// rdo rje can mchog gang yin te// khams gsum ma lus
20b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni// thams cad 'di las kun tu 'byung / zhi zhing dag pa'i gnas gang de// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// brjod med kun 'gro'i gnas yin te// 'di kun de yi rnam 'phrul yin// cung zad dngos grub mtshan nyid gang // thams
20b4(rgyud 'grel): cad de lnga rnam par gnas// spros pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par skor// khams go su mo rnam dag 'di thams cad // sa bon shes rab las byung kun// mtshan ma med cing mchog tu zhi// ye shes sgyu ma'i rjes 'jug pa// sa
20b5(rgyud 'grel): po dag ni gcig pa nyid// ji srid yod pa'i bud shing kun// stong pa'i me yi ma bsreg par// sgrub pa po yi ji ltar mthong // lta ba'i bud shing phung po rnams// stong nyid me yi bsreg byas nas// 'dir ni mnyam nyid la gnas na// de bzhin nyid kyi me yang
20b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gag/ bsam gtan shes rab mig sman gyis// ji srid bsku ba ma byas pa// de srid lta ngan rab rib rnams// dri ma med par ji ltar 'gyur// dngos po brtan dang g.yo ba kun// 'bad pas de ltar rnam sbyangs nas// bdagra myeng gro baphreng la granas
21a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya// bdag gi gang du gang smras pa'i// lha'i rnal 'byor shes byas la// de ni 'bad pas bsgom byas na// 'di ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// sangs rgyas nges par sgrub par byed pa yi// cho ga rkang gnyis mchog
21a2(rgyud 'grel): gis nges par gang bstan pa// spyod pa du mas mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i rgyud du gsal// de srid de ni ma bstan yon tan ldan pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar// shes nas mkhas pa rnams kyis spyod pa dang ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub pa
21a3(rgyud 'grel): chog/ don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dpal ldan
21a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// yang dag spyod pa sbas gyur pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rnam par g.yeng ba'i dgra gsod cing // dge ba'ang gsung ba'i sgrub thabs kyis//
21a5(rgyud 'grel): tshal mo'i las kyi sgrub par bya// dbang bsgyur ba ni mchog bzang po// dpal ldan 'das par rjes 'gro bas// phyag rgya chen po dbang bsrung nas// bzang po dngas grub rab tu bsgrug/ de bzhin 'dod chags rab gnas nas// lnga rnal 'byir de gnas pas//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba rgyang par gyis gnasan// sgrub po gang phyir 'grub par 'gyur/ po shes sems bya shi // spyong pa tham yang nas srung nas// babyis pa thams mas grol pas// gang du 'dod pa de drug ga/ sgrub pa pol pan gdasas
21b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ gsang ba grub pa mdor bsdus nas// dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// gang zhig skye ba du ma yi// dngos grub thob par 'dod 'gyur ba// des ni gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyis// gnyis pa thams cad spang bar bya// dge
21b2(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud// 'dus pa zhes bya'i dbang bskur bas// bzang po dngos grub sbyin byed pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bas// de nas rang 'dod la gnas shing // dang po'i rnal 'byor gcig gtad pas// bla ma'i zhal nas 'byung ba
21b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// rnal 'byor rin chen goms par bya// dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis// mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa yis// shin tu sbas pa'i dbang bskur ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gzugs bzang yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba// phyag rgya 'bad pas rnyed
21b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// rgyud kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas// slob dpon la ni dbul bar bya// phyag rgyar bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// gus pa'i 'o ma mar me dang // dri dang phreng ba rgyan chen gyis// de nas blo dang ldan pas mchod// de la gus pas mchod bya zhing // blo dang ldan
21b5(rgyud 'grel): pas cho ga bzhini// bla ma phyag rgyar ldan mthong nas// rtog pa'i cho ge'i rim pa bzhin// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni// sa la rab tu btsugs byas la// bstod pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// cho ga bzhin du brjod par bya// kun mkhyen sa kun dbang phyug pa
21b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i bdag/ thugs kyi bdag po dpa' bo che// dpa' bo gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'byung po kun bdag bdag nyid gnas// rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad pa// nyon mongs mthar mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod//
22a1(rgyud 'grel): sang+yas rgyas kun+d+ha mchog phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje gsum dbyor med pa'i sgra// chos bdag meng pa las byung ba// ye shes bdud rtsi phyag 'tshal 'dud// kun mabyon ye shes phung po can// spyod pa'i 'khor lo rnam spyong ga
22a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen ye shes chen po pa// gzi brjid chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag chen dpa' bo chen po ste// stobs chen mchod pa chen po pa// bdud mthar byed pa dpa' chen po// dpa' bo dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// skye dang gnas dang spyad pa
22a3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ byed pa por 'gyur 'gro ba'i gtso// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid// ngo mtshar mchog gyur phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes rnam shes zhes bya ba'i// lam du 'jug 'gyur phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod//
22a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma los byung phyag 'tshal 'dud// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// cho ga bzhin du gsol btab nas// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas// snyan pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya// khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// ye shes bla med bya ba shes// de
22a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar dbang skur rin chen gyis// mgon pos bdag ni dbang skur mdzod// dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis// dpal ldan chos kyi rdo rje la// gsang ba de nyid bstan pa ltar// mgon pos de bzhin bka' drin gsol// sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas
22a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// dmyal ba nas ni gtso bos drongs// sdug bsngal thams cad thar mdzad pa// mgon med bdag la thugs rje mdzod// khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni// gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis// 'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis// de phyir
22b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mchog gnang mdzod// gsol ba 'debs pa'i cho ga mchog/ bzang po de ltar thob gyur nas// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mtshos// bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur pas// rje su rtse phyir rab dga' bas// gsang zhing
22b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang gyur pas// dam tshigs de nas thob par bya// bu yi srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi chung ma brten par bya// 'di ni cho ga mdor bsdus pa'i// phyag rgya chen po nges
22b3(rgyud 'grel): brten pas// 'di ni rtag tu bya ba yin// dam tshig bzhi po 'di nyid ni// bzang po khyod kyi rtag tu brten// de ltar dam tshig thos gyur nas// bzang po dngos grub kun ster ba// phyag rgya dang ni ldan gyur pa'i// slob dpon thugs rje ldan pA yi// rdo rje pad+ma snyoms
22b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cing // yang dag rab sbyin la gnas nas// lha yi rnal 'byor skyeng gyur pas// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// 'bad pas gsung gi rdo rje yi// pad+ma las byung blang bar bya// khrag dang khu ba rnams bskyes la// slob dpon mchog gis mchod pa'i phyir// mi
22b5(rgyud 'grel): yi thod par blugs nas ni// bshang gci rdo rje chur ldan pas// de nas slob ma bkug byas la// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs nas// gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas// dam tshig du ni sbyin par bya// dngos grub kun gyi gnas gyur cing // sangs rgyas byin
22b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs lam gyur pas// rdo rje slob ma de nyid rig/ cho gas de ltar gtang byas pas// rang gi phyag rgya dam tshig ni// bzang ldan rgyud nas gsungs pa nyid// shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// rtag tu byang chub sems la dga'// mA ma kI
23a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar yongs dag pa// rab dga' gos ni nam spang ba ma// 'dini yang dag mamyod byas nas// phyag rgya'i pad+ma rnam gnas pa// ston bzhin spyod pa'i slob ma ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis pa la// bkra shes brjod pa'i tshig gis nA~M/
23a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rdu yab rgyal mtshan gdugs la sog/ phreng ba tsan+dan la sogs mchod// phyag rgya'i dbang bskur rin chen gyis// dam tshig la gnas brtan par bzhag/ khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur nas// slob mas
23a3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar byas la// de la rjes gnang sbyin bya ste// rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// chos kyi rdo rje gang 'dod par// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rdo rje sems
23a4(rgyud 'grel): dpas gsungs gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchog gis bshad par gyis// de ltar bstan pas skyob ma la// yang dag pad+ma sbyin rab spras dang // phyag rgya rin chen dbang bskur dang // rjesu gnang ba'i khyad par gyis// rgyud kyi don la nges byas nas// rdo rje theg
23a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim 'byung ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstan// sems can mchog gis bshad par gyis// 'di lta bu yi dbang bskur bas// sgrub pa'i nges po byas gyur nyid// de nyid bsgom pas par gyur pos// nges pa mchos
23a6(rgyud 'grel): ni thob par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas nas// lugs bcas rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya sgrubs// lugs bcas rim pa de nyid nges pa'i blo ldan sgom gyur rdo rje can// /
23b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan+da bzang po rab dga'i yid can dngos grub don kun sgrub// mi yis tshe 'di nyid la 'grub 'gyur dpal ldan gsang grub la gnas nas// thabs bzangs dag dang ldan pas brjod med mchog gyur go 'phang dam par 'gro/ de ltar thams
23b2(rgyud 'grel): cad shes byas la// rim pa ji bzhin gnas byas te// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa yis// ji ltar yang dag bstan pa ltar// de nas rang 'dod la gnas pa'i// gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i// dngos grub bzang po la 'bad pas// rigs kun la ni
23b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu spyod// yang na phyag rgya ldan pa yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas// rgod dang phreng la sogs bzang po// sems ni spro bar byed pa can// chags med gsang ba grub pa yis// go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gnyis pa thams cad rnam
23b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs lo// mchog tu dga' ba spel bar bya// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par sdud par byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po mngon par bstan pa'i
23b5(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste lnga pa'o// // gsang ba'i spyod pa dge 'byung zhing // sangs rgyas tham cad skyed byed la// ga yang ba'i sgra rnams zad byed pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rkang pa rkyang pa spangs nas ni// 'khor ba'i mngag gzhug dor nas ni//
23b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu sgrub// rgod dang 'gyod dang gnyid la sogs// 'bad pas rab tu spang bar bya// gzhan du bskal pa bya ba ni// brgyar yang dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// mgon po rdo rje slob dpon la// dngos
24a1(rgyud 'grel): po kun gyi phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i gzugs// gsang ba'i dngos grub yang dag spyad// mtshan ma med cing snang ba med// rang gi lus kyi thabs ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'bad pas rab tu
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// 'bad pas de ltar shes byas nas// rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun dbang po// sngags pas rang lus de nyid dang // rdo rje can dngos dbyer med pa'i// sna tshogs spyod pa gsal gyur pa'i// gsang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyod//
24a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// mchog tu dga' bas yongasu dgang // rnam rtog yid las byung ba yi// 'jig rten pa yi gang smad pa'i// de de gzugasu gnas byas la// gsang ba'i brtul zhugs brtul zhugs can// ji ltar dpol
24a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dus spyod pa'i// gsang ba zhes byar rab gnas pa// gshang gci zas su byas gyur na// sgrub pa'i snod du nges par 'gyur// dam tshig bzang po gzhan dag kyang // gsal byed la sogs khyad par dang // phyag rgya'i 'ching ba byin brlabs
24a5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'argyud nas gsungs pa'i bzang po kun// rdo rje'i tshig ni bzang po 'di// rdo rje thugs kyis gsungs pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa bla med pa// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje thugs kyis gang sbas pa/ de rje bdag gis bshad par
24a6(rgyud 'grel): byaHsangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// mnyam gzhag mi smra gyur pa yi// smyon pa'i gzugs bzhog par bya// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam// yang dang yang du ngal byas pa//
24b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom// rtag tu bsgom dang ldan gyur pa'i// rig pas rang gis rtogs byas la// grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang // tshal la sogs par 'khyam par bya// bzhi mdo dag dang dur khrod dang // lha rten
24b2(rgyud 'grel): pho brang khyad par du// dor ba rnying pas mgo bcings la// tshogs bcas gnas su 'jug na yang // mchog tu bde ba bsgom par bya// 'bad med rol mo brdung ba der// gar dang glu yi g.yeng bar bya// 'o ma sgron mar ldan pa de'i// rgyal
24b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan can gyi gnas 'jug bya// la lar rgol cing la lar smra// la lar glu yang blang bar bya// la lar gar bya la lar brdab// l-i lar sna tshogs brjod bya ba// ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur ba// thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya// skyo bar
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid// nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten spyod pa rnam spangs la// rigs rnams kun la kun tu spyad// 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad du// gcig tu 'o ma goms byed par// rol la sogs pa'i dam
24b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig la// shin tu sred par mi bya'o// nga rgyal spang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid kyis kyang goms par bya// mchog tu dga' ba'i sems nyid ni// ji ltar myos par mi 'gyur bar// dam tshig thams cad sngon 'gro ba// stegs pas de ltar
24b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nyid// glu dang gar gyi dga' ba ni// ji ltar yid ni mi nyams par// ji srid mngon sum gyur gyi bar// de ltar de nyid la sems bzhag/ bdud rtsi lnga la gcig gus pas// de nyid nges par byas nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad blang byas nas//
25a1(rgyud 'grel): smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis brgyan pa'i// smyon pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa// de ni rtag tu brten par bya// sngags pas gsang ba'i spyod pa ni// cho ga bzhin du spyad par bya// srog chags kun lus las byung ba'o// sgron ma rtag tu
25a2(rgyud 'grel): chog bzhin// lha yi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// 'bang bas bza' bar bya ba nyid// sbrad ma'i skyug pa 'dres pa dang // bshad dang bci ba bsres byas nas// sgron ma lnga dang bsres pa yi// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa bya// dngos med mchog tu ni
25a3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can+da// rang rig tsam zhig bskyed byas la// go 'phang mchog de sgom par bya// sngags pas 'di ltar bsgom byas la// rang gi lus mchog bsgom par bya// smad par gyur pa ma lus pa// dpyad pa med par bya ba
25a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// btsun mo'i rang byung me tog ni// byang chub sems dong bcas gyur pa// blangs la gsung gi rdo d+hA can// bde ba chen po yang dag mchod// glang po khye d+ha rdu myo yi// snronA mA mi las byung ba dag/ sngags pas rtag tu bza' bya zhing //
25a5(rgyud 'grel): du bza' bar mi bya'o// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// gang zhig rtag tu goms byed pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin// de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// slongs mo spyod pa bya ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs can gyis snod mi bzung // grong pas zos
25a6(rgyud 'grel): shing bor ba yi// gyo dum la sogs der bza' zhing // gang du bor zhing byin par bza'// des ni gang du zos gyur nas// tshim par gyur nas de yang dor// de yi smad g.yogs dum bu yang // rnying zhing dum bur gyur pas bya// yang na
25b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi gos can gyis// gong du 'gro bar 'dod par bya// til 'bras tsam gyi dngos po yang // yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// yongasu 'dzin las sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal gyis ni sems 'khor 'gyur// 'khor bas
25b2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni zhum 'gyur te// zhum pas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// dngos grub med na 'khor ba ste// 'khor pas dmyal ba sgrub par byed// dmyal bar nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyis// grangs med bskal bar gnod par 'gyur// /
25b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skabs sdug bsngal gyur pa dang // gzhan gyi bran la sogs par skye// rnam dgra legs par 'dod pa yi// skye ba slar yang thob mi 'gyur// de ltar bdag gis bdag nyid kyis// gsang ba'i spyod pa rnam bsgoms nas// khams
25b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnam pa gcig gyur pa// rnam dag thabs bzangs la gnas pas// rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yis// skyo ba slar yang thob par 'gyur// gsang ba grub pa la gnas nas// de nas seng ge bzhin du spyod// smyon pa'i gzugs
25b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyur pa yis// kun spyod thams cad rnam spangs la// gsang gsum dri med rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba kun la spyod par bya// shing rdo sna yi rang bzhin gyis// lha rnams la yang phyag mi bya// lus nyid la ni mchod pa dang // bla ma
25b6(rgyud 'grel): gus pas phyag bya'o// sa rdo'i rang bzhin mchod rten dang // glegs bam la sogs mi bya zhing // rmi lam du yang dkyil 'khor sogs// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bya'o// theg pa gsum la zhugs rnams la// phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o// sangs
26a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dam par mi 'dzin nu// rnal 'byor pa gzhan smos ci dgos// bsgom la chags gyur sems kyis ni// ngag gi rtsod pa mi bya'o// dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur// nyams 'gyur yid ni g.yengs gyur
26a2(rgyud 'grel): pas// sbyar ba la sogs 'byed pa yis// de nyid rig par rtag tu spyad// rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal nyid// spangs nus gzhan du mi bya'o// dag pa de nyid la gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya skye// dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur// 1ma
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bas yid ni sdug bsngal 'thob// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// ji srid de la rtogs gyur pas// dngos med glo 'phang lha gon so nas// thabs bzung dag dang ldan pa yi// rtog las gang zhig 'byung ba rnams// ma brtag par ni 'byung
26a4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// bsgom bya'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci'ang rung // de kun skad cig tsam la ni// rang nyid gnas par 'gyur ba yin// bsgom pa 'di ni bar chad can// sngags pas gsang sngags mi dad+ma lding /
26a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi byo la// phyag rgya mi bcing phyag mi bya// lus nyid dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs te// shes rab phyag rgya zhes byar glags// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dgra sngags// de bsten pa ni phyag yin no// nang gi bdag
26a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid de byas nas// mkhas pas phyi rol thams cad spangs// gsang ba'i spyad pa dang ldan pas// de nyid rig pas rtag tu spyad// dpal sngon rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ rnam par rtog med sngags pa yis// gsong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas//
26b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar 'gyur med 'grub par 'gyur// spro zhing de la rab sbyor bas// dam tshig dag ni skyong ba dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis// shes rab thabs dag rnam par bsgom// gar dang glu sogs sbyor ba yi// pad+ma rdo rje rnam rol zhing
26b2(rgyud 'grel): bur chad sgron ma gus pa dang // dI dang phreng sogs rgya chen dang // gling bu rnga zlum sgra dag dang // rdza rta'i sgra la sogs pa dang // lha rdzas lus bzangs dri bzangs ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub// lha rdzas bzang po mchog 'di dang //
26b3(rgyud 'grel): nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub 'gyur ba// spyad par bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// byang chub sems ni rab spros pas// chu skyes khyad par
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya// rtag tu chags pa dang ldan zhing // mchog tu dga' ba la sred pas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos// rtag tu ngo tsha spangs gyur pas// dam tshig spyod la ci zhen pa// smyon pa'i/
26b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis mi smra ba// dur khrod la sogs gar gnas nas// mA mra kI dang spyan la sogs// rgyan rnams la sogs kyis brgyan pa'i// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom// rdo rje na mkha'i khoms
26b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas// der ni thams cad bsgom par bya// zhal gsum pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// ye shes rgya chen rlabs spro bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rang dngos rig pa bskul byas na// sangs rgyas ye shes gzugs can
27a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rab tu bsdus pa dag kyang bya// phyogs bcu dag tu rgyug byed pa'i// rang sems gal te 'dzin par 'dod gyur na// sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur rang gi sems// de tshe yang dag sbyor ba mchog tu bya// gong du
27a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams myong phyag rgya rjes bsam bya// rtser ldan rjes 'gro bzang dga' chag pa can// chag pas thob gyur de las sems gtad nas// slar yang rim pa'i khyad par gsal bar bsgrub// bsam gtan 'di la sbyor ba yi// rin chen sems ni
27a3(rgyud 'grel): brtan gyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rang gnas de// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// de lta de nyid shes gyur nas// der gtad nas ni bsgom par bya// ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar// blo bzang sems ni mnyam gzhag pas// skyon
27a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyis kun tu khyab par bya// cung zud mig ni rgyal 'gyur bas// byang chub rin chen bsgom par bya// la la rgyud dang smra ba dang // la lar gar dag byed pa na// ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bas// bsgom pa la chags soms
27a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis so// rnam par rtog medo sdigs pa yiso// ji lta'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pas// dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs naso// bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur// bzang po'i rigs lnga las byung ba'i// dam tshig rtag tu baba' bar bya// khyad par
27a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang ldan pa yi// dam tshig brten pa'i mchod par bya// rtag tu bde gshegs bsam gtan pas// spyan ni rgyas par gyur nas su// byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// spyod pa rin chen la gnas
27b1(rgyud 'grel): shing // rdo rje ye shes la mos pas// bde gshegs go 'phang 'dod na ni// mi dge'i sems su mi bya'o// khams gsum du ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// btsun mo kun la 'dod par bya// dman las skyes dang 'gyur ba can// de nyid rnal 'byor pas mchod
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// rnam par snang mdzad las byung dang // srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i// srog chags rnams ni rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub 'dod na sgrub par bya// bshang gci sa bon la sogs pa// sna yi nang nas byung ba yis// rang lus rdo rje bsgoms
27b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// khams gsum pa las byung ba yi// rtag tu dam tshig la mchod pas// de nyid rin chen la rab sbyar// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'dir ni mang du smra ci dgas// gang dang gang zhig dmigs 'gyur
27b4(rgyud 'grel): de kun de nyid rnal 'byor du// rig pas rtogs shing blta bar bya// rdo rje sgrub par gang gsungs pa// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// ngom tshig bzang po dang ldan pa'i// de nyid gsum dbyer meng pa'i sku// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par
27b5(rgyud 'grel): byaHkun kyang rtog pa sngon 'gro bas// khams gsum 'di dag rnam par dag/ mi rig dra bas yang dag bsgribs// rmi lam rtsed mo rje su 'gro/ phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid rnams// de ltar bya bad pas dpyad na ni// mtshan ma med cing snang
27b6(rgyud 'grel): modang pa'o// thabs dang bcas pa rnam par bsgom// de ltar chog ldan shes pas// sems ni de nyid byin brlabs nas// ji ltar thos pos 'tsho byod cing // dam tshig ma lus la rab sbyor// tshong dpon bram ze rje tsho rigs dang // shi bson
28a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gron pos na// zos shing tshim nus bor gyur pa'i// gcig tu bsdus pa'i dman pa rnams// khyi dang wA yi smad pa dag/ blangs nas de ni bza' bar bya// de nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan du 'grub par mi
28a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// cung zhig smyon pa'i sems ldan pa'i// rigs rnams kun la mnyam par sbyor// bzang po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gar// rdo rje gar gyis gom par gnas// glu rnams len par byed pa yi// rdo rje glu ni mi gsal bar// khams
28a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag tu grags pa yi// gzhan dag gsal ba nyid du len// sna tshogs skad bsres glu len cing // sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam// las dag gang gis skye bo rnams// gang dang gang du 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas
28a4(rgyud 'grel): na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching las grol byar 'gyur// khyad par thams cad spangs pa yi// de nyid zhi ba thob gyur nas// thabs bzang dgu dang ldan pa yi// go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya// 'byung po kun gyi de nyid gang // bzung
28a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// 'gro kun mchog tu zhi ba nyid// khyad par gnas pa'i bzung po gang // rang lus thibs dang bcas pa yi// de nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// bus pa kun la thal mo'i sgra// rim gyi gar ni bzang po bya//
28a6(rgyud 'grel): kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi// byang chub mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bzang po go 'phang der gnas nas// gang dang gang du gnas na yang // byang chub mchog tu nges byas pas// spyod ngan chen yang 'grub par 'gyur/
28b1(rgyud 'grel): smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten nas// yid ni de nyid byin brlabs nas// gsang spyod mchog gi rol pa yi// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rgya chen khyim rnams ni// spong bar nus pa ma yin yang // dpal ldan gsang
28b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus las bstan pa'i// byang chub 'byung ba'i spyod pa rnams// khyim de nyid du gnas byas nas// 'jig rten spyod pa la gnas nas// ji ltar rig pa mi 'gyur bar// gsang ba'i dam tshig spyad par bya// mtshan mo gsal por byas nas ni//
