28b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma gcig tu goms byas pas// phyag rgyar bcas pas bya ba ste// yid ches pas yin gzhan gyis min// dri chu la sogs dam tshig rnams// rtag tu spyad par bya ba nyid// gcig tu dam tshig goms byed na// de nyid bla med 'grub par
28b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// shin tu gsang ba'i grogs dag nyid// de nyid shes shing mchog gyur pa// de dang lhan cig dam tshig rnams// rgyud las gsung baspyad par bya// bud mdo bzang dang longs spyod bzang // de bzhin gnas mal bzang sogs kyis// de nyid
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pas ngal gyur pa'i// ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig spyod pa der gtad par// khyim nyid du yang 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig spyod pa dman gyur na// spyod pa min zhing khyim du'ang min// de ltar dam tshig mngon ldan
28b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing / ye shes bzang po la dga' ba// tshig 'dis ni bskul byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// nyams su blangs bya thams cad ni// 'gal ba'i ngom tshig la sogs pa// smad par gyur pa sngon 'gro ba'i// ma lus pa dag gang bstan
29a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dngos grub bzung ba'i rgyu yi phyir// de dag thams cad bya ba nyid// 'di kun mngon sum nyid du ni// byed pa'i char ni dbye bya ste// gsang ba spyod pa ldan pa yi// de nyid shes yin gzhan ma yin// 'gal ba'i dam tshig la
29a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod// rtags can gzugs la gnas gyur nas// 'jig rten spyod las 'das 'gyur te// smad pa rnams la gsal po ru// nyams su len par byed gyur cing // nus pa dag ni ma skyes par// kun rdzob
29a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid du 'jug 'gyur ba'i// dman pa'i rigs la sogs pa la// rtag tu dam tshig sogs spyod cing // 'dod dang bcas pa'i sems nyid kyis// thab khung dkyil 'khor sogs byed pa// rtag dang chad pa smra ba yi// gang zhig cho ga 'dir gnas pas// de ni bstan pa
29a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig byed gsungs// gal te rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas// sgrub pa 'di ni byed 'gyur na// de ni mtshan mo dam tshig spyad// nyin mo shin tu gsang bar bya// dman pa'i 'gro ba nyan thos sogs// ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rig pa// de ltar sngags pas bya ba ste//
29a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sgrub phyir shin tu sbyang // 'jig rten kun gyi mamago nong cing // 'jig rten kun la mi gnod par// de ban ni sprugs pas 'dir bya'o// bde ga shegs dngos grub 'dod gyur na// gsang ba grub pa la gnas shing // sgrub pa po la nus pa zhig/ ji srang
29a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar mi gyur pa// de srid brtul zhugs rtags mi bzung // nus pa zhig ni skyed 'gyur ba// de nas gsang ba'i spyod pa spangs// de rjes rig pa'i brtul zhugs bzang // de dag rtag tu blang bar bya// go 'phang nyams dga' der gnas pas// rnam
29b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor der gtang bsgom par bya// 'du 'dzi thams cad der bral nas// go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'du 'dzi ring du spangs shing rang bzhin g.yo ba'i sems nyid rab sbyar nas// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog ldan de nyid la gnas
29b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// nyon mongs pa yi dgra tshogs mang po las rgyal mi nyams bzang por gyur pa yi// sems can don ldan sems kyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams 'jig rten gsum na spyod// spyan ni cung zhig phye nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i sems
29b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi// cho ga shes par gyur pas sna tshogs ma lus brdzun pa'i blo dang sgra spangs la// mchog tu legs par spyod pa'i sems can don ldan 'jig rten gsum na grags par byed// dngos rnams dpag med byang chub go 'phang mchog gyur
29b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med sems can mchog gyur rol pa gang // khyim gyis 'dzin pa rtsa bzhin ma lus sgyu ma bzhin lta ba// spre'u dang rlung dong grogs bzhin g.yo ba'i sems zhes bya la dbang du gyur pas gzhag/ dngos po'i de nyid bsgoms pa'i lus can dam pa'i
29b5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba de nyid mchog/ sems can don la spro ba'i ngo nyid sems la nges par rnal 'byor dbang phyug rol bar byed// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
29b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya ba las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dri ma med par byed pa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa'i rim pa ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / dag cing rang bzhin dri ma meng // sna tshogs gzugs rnams
30a1(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs// 'ching dang mya ngan rnam spangs pa// lha yi phyag rgya mchog rnyed nas// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// de bzhin lha min bu mo'ang rung // dri za'i bu mo gzugs ldan pa'i// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma yang rung // 'di
30a2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bu mo rnal 'byor ma 'am// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// bkug nas longs spyod nyid du bya// lha rdzas grub pa gang yin de// dam tshig sbyor bar rab tu brjod// bsgrubs na mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing // gang
30a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur// des ni sems ni rnam g.yeng bar// nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ro// mi yi bu mo mthu chen gyis// dam tshig bzang po 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing // chu dong rdul dag rnam par spangs// sna tshogs
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dag rab ston pa'i// lha rdzas btsun mo bsten par bya// dri dang lhan cig mnyam ldan pa'i// skye bo med pa'i tshal stong la// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// seng ge bzhin du rnam par spyad// lha rdzas btsun mo 'gugs pa yi// nus pa
30a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te med gyur na// 'dod pas gnod po nyid gyur la// ngos ni mi yi bu mo bsten// longs spyod bzong po dang ldan pa'i// g.yeng ba'i myos pa zhi bya'i phyir// de phyir sgrub pa'i dbang po lnga// mi lus byung ba'i bu mo bsten// rnam g.yeng khro ba
30a6(rgyud 'grel): mang ba dang // skyon rnams thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing // rgas shing mya ngan gyis non pa'i// mi yi bu mo shin tu spang // de lta'i lha rdzas med gyur nas// dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu yi phyir// rgyud kyi bya ba'i rim pa yis// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya//
30b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar tha mal byang chub nyid// sngags kyi cho gu bzhin byas nas// mchog tu dga' ba'i yid can gyis// byang chub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// tha mal pa yi rim pa yi// phyag rgya de nyid bshad par bya// mthar skyes dang por byas pas ni// gang gi
30b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// mthar skyes mi srid bu mo dang // de bzhin tshos ma'i bu mo dang // smad pa'i rigs las byung gyur dang // gang yang bde ba rnyed pa dang // rgyud nas gsungs pa'i rig byas pa'i// khyad par du ni bu mo nyid// dam tshig spyod
30b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad la// byis pa nyid nas rom gyis brlab// byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas// chos nyid la ni bzod byis pas// mkhas pas cho ga ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsum dbyer med par bsgrub// rgyud nas ji skad gsungs pa yi// mtsho rje
30b4(rgyud 'grel): pa de la gnas nas brtsam// gus pas 'o ma smon ma dang // phreng ba la sogs rgyan rnams dang // thal ba bzang po bsgru bya zhing // ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan par// sngags pas rang gi gzugs nyid dang // de yi gzugs kyang bya ba nyid//
30b5(rgyud 'grel): stag gi pags pas gos byas shing // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga blang zhing // dril bu cang te'u sa rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rna ba mgrin dpung pa// rus pa'i dum bus rnam par brgyan// mi yi thod pa g.yon pa ste// de
30b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin g.yas par DA ma ru// bdag dang phyag rgya de bzhin du// mA ma kI 'am spyan dag gi ma// bdag nyid rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas// 'di 'dra'i gzugasu byas nas nas ni// rgyud las byung ba'i cho ga yis// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyad//
31a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med nges par byas nas ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par
31a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// // mthar skyes ngo mtshar chen po las// rgyud las sgrub thabs gang gsungs pa// ji ltar nges par des 'thob pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// skyob pa'i nges pa yongs spangal
31a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs byas nas// gang du sus kyang mi shes par// mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya// tshogs kyi mtshan ma blangs nas ni// mgo bo'i sgra ni bregs nas kyang // ral pa sbom po gcig bzhags nas// gtsug
31a4(rgyud 'grel): phud gcig ni bzung bar bya// ru rag sha dang shel bzang po// tshan tshan dag tu spel byas pa'o// phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang ba dag/ mgul pa'i rgyan du bzung bar bya// dpung rgyan gdu bu bzang po dag/ 'od zer 'phro zhing 'khrug gyur
31a5(rgyud 'grel): dang \u0f7f'bad pas mtshan gsum byas nas ni// mdzub mo la ni zangs ma'i rgya// mdun gyi phyogs su 'phyang gyur pa'i// smad g.yogs dum bu de nas bzung // lcags mdung la btags me tog snod// phrag pa dag la dgal bar bya// yan
31a6(rgyud 'grel): lag thams cad rnam brgyan nas// tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs su bya// phrag pa gnyis ni dag ba byas nas// mthar skyos khyim du 'jug par bya// bzang po de ltar gsang byas nas// de nas bsgrub par bya phyir dpyad // gang zhig sus kya
31b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par// bzang po'i yul du 'khyam par bya// grong khyer sum brtsegs nye ba'i mthar// mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya// yang dag tu nA lha gzhan ni// des ni shes par mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu khrus dang lha mchod cing // rtag tu rang gi
31b2(rgyud 'grel): grub mthar bsgom// yi ge las ni cung zhig gis// rang byung lta la chags gyur pas// gdol pa'i gzugs kyi tshogs nyid kyi// de ltar de yi nang zhugs la// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya// chos dang grub mtha' sngon 'gro bas// de nas
31b3(rgyud 'grel): de la ston par byed// dus kyi phyi ma la sogs pa'am// yang na dbugs kyi sgom pa ston// de nas rgyud nas gsungs kun gyis// yid brtan pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur// dbang dang dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bas// bdag nyid kyis ni slob mar byas//
31b4(rgyud 'grel): de de yi byin pa'i rdzas rnams dang // snga na yod pa dang bcas pas// de ni de la gtang byas la// de yi bla ma mchod phyir byin// de yi bkas gnang blang bya ste// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// de ni rgyud don bden pa la// mkhas shing dam
31b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'dod byas nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas la// blo ldan rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// nges par rgyud gsungs dam tshig gis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// ri 'am rgya mtsho'i 'grami dag gam// skyon rnams spangs pa'i
31b6(rgyud 'grel): yul 'khor dang // dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// phug dang grong khyer rnying pa dag/ dri med chu yi gang ba dang // me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan// ljon shing 'khri shing gis brgyan pa// khyad par du ni dben gyur pa//
32a1(rgyud 'grel): der ni phyag rgya dang bcas par// sgrub po brtan zhing nges pa yis// sgom pa'i sbyor ba der gtang ba'i// rtag tu nags su bsod snyoms blang // byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas// lus ni nus pa can byas nas// yang
32a2(rgyud 'grel): dag rim pas der gnas nas// yang dang yang du goms par bya// ljon shing rgyal po de dag kun// sgrub po dbang po mdangs ldan pas// de nyid sbyor bas bkug byas nas// zhal zas bzang po ster bar 'gyur// blo bzang rtag tu
32a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod med cing // blo yis rtag tu goms par bya// rdo rje theg pa la dga' zhing // rtag tu bde gshegs bsam pa can// bstan bcos ma lus la goms shing // de bzhin gtong ldan dpa' zhing gsal// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na
32a4(rgyud 'grel): yang / mnyam pa'i sems nyid gcig tu bsgom// phyag rgya'ang de 'drar shes bya ste// chags med zhen pa med pa dang // zab mo'i chos dang ldan pa dang // sgrub po 'dod bzhin rjes su 'byung // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring mo// gzugs
32a5(rgyud 'grel): dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// byang chub sems la dga' zhing gsal// rdo rje sgrub la shin tu gsal// ci ltar bu bzhin brtse ba dang // de bzhin spun dang pha ma ltar// rtag tu sgrub po mthong ba na// brtse bas shin tu goms byed na// bud
32a6(rgyud 'grel): med sgyu bral yid du 'ong // skal ba bzang zhing snyan par smra// phrag dog spangs shing rjes su mthun// sgrub pa po yi bka' bzhin byed// dmar ser lus phra gzugs bzang ma// tshul khrims yon tan gyis brgyan pa// mdog snam cho ga
32b1(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang // ring min thung ba ma yin pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'am// yang na de bzhin bcu drug gam// de nyid rig pa dang ldan pas// mur gong mtha' ni rnam par mdzes// yan lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs// sku yi rtse kun cung
32b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig 'khyil// skad snyan shin tu dga' ba can// lta ba bzang po rnam rgyas pa// 'bad pas bu mo 'di 'dra ba// dngos grub don gnyer gyur nas su// rtogs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtsam//
32b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas de ni bzung byas nas// go 'phang mchog ni sgrub par bya// rang gi rdo rje mchod nas ni// byang chub sems ni btang bar bya// de nas sku yi rdo rje bsgom// ngag gi rdo rje kun nas bzung // de yi b+ha gar byung ba'i khus// sems kyi rdo rje
32b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mchod// de la gus pas mchod nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba las// de nyid sbyor la bsgom par bya// tsun+da da 'am ni mA ma kIr// dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgoms nas// thams cad bya ba kho na yin// dam tshig gi ni khyad par dang //
32b5(rgyud 'grel): bud med mchog ni brten par bya// b+ha gar ling ga gzhag nas ni// byang chub se m+ban btang mi bya/ der skyed pa yi dga' ba yis// sems ni bkang bas bsgom par bya// ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub sems// gtong bar byed pa ma yin pa// de srid kun dga' las
32b6(rgyud 'grel): byung bde// ci yang rgyun ma 'chad par 'thob// bde ba de yi ngo bo dang // yang dag ldan pa'i byang chub mchog/ bdag nyid rtag tu bsgoms nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur pa// byang chub sems
33a1(rgyud 'grel): ni der lhung bas// phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur nas// ma spang dngos grub ga la yod// phyag rgya ma la dam 'khyud nas// yang dang yang du 'o byas la// gnas de ru ni bskyod pa yis// byang chub sems ma rab 'bab pas//
33a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgoms la// lha mo de la 'o yang bya// mig gnyis dag ni rgyas gyur nas// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// ma mchu cung zhig rgyas pa yis// nu ma cung zhig dam par 'dzin// brla gnyis dri ma med pa mchog/ mig kyang cung zhig
33a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dang // rdo rje theg par ngalnga byis pas// dwer gtad pa yi bsgom dang ldan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu dor gtad bsam pa tsan/ 'o ma byin nas yang dang yang // khyad par du ni rab tu mchod// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bzhi/
33a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya// yi da 'ong bcos ma'i zas dang ni// dri dang me tog sogs bsnyen bkur// nya dang sha dang pur chang sogs// sems ni spro bar byed pa can// 'bad pas de lta bus mchod nas// de nyid ched du bsgom par bya// cho ga
33a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis bskul nas ni// rdo rje sems dpar bdag 'grub 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yi// bdud rtsi me tog myang bar bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas pa// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// bsgom dang dam tshig nyams len pas
33a6(rgyud 'grel): de lta'i dngos grub myur du thob// sems kyi dam tshig sdang ba la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dngos grub med// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang // dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba ni// shes pas 'bad pas bsgoms byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di
33b1(rgyud 'grel): la the tshom med// ji skad gsungs pa'i sa phyogs su// rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na ni// sdig pa ma lus sbyangs nas ni// rig ma dang bcas grol bar 'gyur// grong dang grong khyer dag tu 'am// sems ni rab tu dga' ba der// der
33b2(rgyud 'grel): mi rig pa'i brtul zhugs spang // dgag pa dang ni bsgrub pa med// dpal ldan 'dus rab yongs gsal ba'i// sgrub thabs rgyud las gang gsungs pa// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i spyod pas rnam brgyan pa// de ni
33b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub myur thob par// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs// dam tshig spyod pa dang ldan par// rtag tu goms par bya ba yin// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsung ba grub pa zhes
33b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba las tshogs kyi brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// me dang chu dang dug sogs la// thabs ni gang gis mi shes pa// de ni tshig dang nub pa dang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// de bzhin
33b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang 'dus rgyud kyis ni// shes rab thabs ni spangs gyur pa// 'gal ba dag ni spyod byed pa'i// bsam ngan de ni brlag par 'gyur// gang gis de yi de nyid shes// yang dgra rab sbyin la gnas nas// dpal ldan 'dus pa la dga'
33b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems can de ni steng du 'gro// gsang ba'i spyod dang brtul zhugs dang // phyag rgya rgyas pa gang gsungs pa// 'di dag thams cad rtog don yin// bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin te// gang yang rgyas pa'i bdag nyid can// kun kyang sems
34a1(rgyud 'grel): can bsam pas gsungs// bsgom pa la ni rab gnas pa'i// ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// rnam rtog du ma rgyas gyur pa// 'di ni thams cad spangs byas nas// phyag rgya chen po la 'bad pas// shes
34a2(rgyud 'grel): rab ldan pas rtag tu bsgom// 'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas ni// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// yang dang yang du goms byas nas// pad+ma rdo rje'i tshig bzhin du// dus mi ring bas 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig dag ni thams cad
34a3(rgyud 'grel): las// bla ma mchod pa mchog yin te// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ dpal ldan 'dus pa 'am gzhan du brtan// bzung min brjod pa ma yin pa// sems can kun la yang dag gnas// lus ngag yid kyi bde ba yin// rnam rtog
34a4(rgyud 'grel): med cing gnas med pa// dag cing ngo bo nyid med pa// byang chub sems zhes dran par bya// bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// de ni myur du thob par 'gyur// khams gsum rin po cher gyur pa// slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan
34a5(rgyud 'grel): med// gang las bka' drin thob pa yi// mkhas pas dngos grub du ma 'thob// yang dag gsungs pas spyod pa gang // dpal ldan mnyam nyid gnyis med gsungs// de snga ni slob dpon bya ba ste// gzhan gyis 'grub par mi
34a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan dang longs spyod dang // rang gi phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas// bla ma mchod cing phul byas pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya phul nas ni// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub
34b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// gzhan dag phyi rol dam tshig gis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur// 'di ni rgyud kyi bden don gyis// dam tshig gtso bo mchog yin no// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// dpal ldan rdo rje mngon gsungs pa'o// nga mchag
34b2(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad las// gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dbul ba mchog/ gzhan du phyi rol tshul dag gi/ dam tshig 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// gus pas bla ma mchod par bya// rang gi phyag rgya pad+ma yi// mchod
34b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog mgrin pa'i dbyangs dag dang // brla brngub pa yi rol mo dang // rdo rje 'jug pa'i spyod pa dang // rig ma'i ma mchu'i ro myong dang // cung zhig 'khyud par spro ba yi// bza' ba chos pa sna tshogs gang // nya dang khur ba la sogs dang // sha da
34b4(rgyud 'grel): bur chang bzang po dag/ rgyud nas gsungs pa sna tshogs dang // phyag rgya gnyug ma phul byas nas// de nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// 'di lta'i gzugasum byas na// gzhan du dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// rdo rje ston la gang gus pas// 'di
34b5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i tshul du byed 'gyur ba// de nyid rig pa'i las nyid kyis// dri med rdo rje gsum dbyer med// yang dag rab sbyin gsang 'gyur ba// sems can nges 'dir thob par 'gyur// bla ma rdo rje mnyes 'gyur bas// dngos grub bzang po kun sbyin byed//
34b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dam tshig bzang // de ltar rtag par rab bsgrub pas// rdo rje slob dpon thugs rje mchog/ man ngag myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di lta'i tshul gyis 'ongs gyur pa'i// de nyid gsal por yongs shes nas// gus pa'i dngos po
35a1(rgyud 'grel): xxx/ xxx
35a2(rgyud 'grel): sa pa pa byung byar // rko mchog gsus lda song pa dag/ di dag bang pas spyo bar bya/ gang gis rgyam na mas kyi cho// rnam pa / bu mi shes pa pa// khog pa mchog 'a \u0f7fsa byung mas/ ma pan po mug / sa
35a3(rgyud 'grel): da ngam 'gro dag tu 'gro bar gyug dam sems pa'i sems can rnams/ bskas pa brgyas par du ya ngan 'gro sa/ 'gro bar 'gyur/ ngan 'gro gnas zung ma ya / nA~M sakhor ba'i sdug pasngal 'gyur// sangs rgyas ma dang gi 'phru
35a4(rgyud 'grel): tsug bus par mi byed gA/ sdug bsngal 'phongs pa kun 'byung bar// sdug pa'i las kyi 'gro gyu hU~M// bde gshegs mngan ma la brten nas// mnar med par ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ganga'i gi lus pa dang ldan pas// chos nyid bam
35a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed 'gyur bas// dri na sdug po kun spangs nas// gtso bo'i gnas su 'alci bar 'gyur// bla me rdzogs pa'i byu chub tu// 'dod pa'i yon tan k+Sha ldan pas// 'khor ba'i rgyam ni 'jigs pa las// sems can+da rnams ni ngas grol 'gyur
35a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byeng chub mchog gi gnas// phrin med pa'i chos rnams sa// 'jog rten srin la ldan pa po'o// dum mo ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/ oM shes sgrib pas ljongs gyur ba'i// sems can rnams la ngonangam gyis// ye shes
35b1(rgyud 'grel): byed 'gyur te// mun pa la ni mar me bzhin// bde chen mgon po gcig pu nyid// gang zhig rtag tu dran byed cing // zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis gus pa'i// sdig pa thams cad zad gyur nas// sems can de nyid de yi mthus// pad+ma bsnams 'jig
35b2(rgyud 'grel): rten mgon po ltar// dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa// dus mi ring bar 'gyur pa nyid// gang zhig dag pa'i de nyid sems// gus pas lcags kyus brtan bkug nas// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// gsang ba'i sgrub thabs gang
35b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa// gal te de ni bzang gyur na// bzang zhes ci phyir brjod par byed// gal te dman ngang 'dres gyur na// slob dpon rnams kyi de bzod mdzod// gang zhig rgyud kyi rjes 'brengs nas// brjod pa dag gis ma shes pa'i// rang gi bu bzhin
35b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rnams// ma lus pa dag bzod par mdzod// dpal ldan mgon po bde chen gyis// zhabs kyi pad+mas nyer 'tsho ba// pad+ma rdo rjes sems can kun// rje su bzung phyir byas pa yi// gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba// dngos grub kun gyi
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i bla// grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po// 'bud pa nyid kyis bsten par bya// blo bzang rtogs pa'i cho ga bzhin// gsang ba grub par gang spyod pa// mi yi tshe 'di nyid la ni// dngos grub ma lus 'thob par 'gyur// sems can kun dang
35b6(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig tu// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang grub pa'i// legs pa ma lus gang yod pas// dpal ldan slob dpon zhabs grub shog/ sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas// yul gzhan la ni sems zhen pas// sgrub dka' yul dang
36a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig tu// kun tog thams cad spang bar bya// gnas skabs lnga ni gnod gyur na// skad cag gis ni 'khor bar ltung // snyoms dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang // rgod dang the tshom zhes bya ba'o// sgrib
36a2(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga po sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mi bzhed do// lnga po de ni yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas nas// smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis rol na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gsong ba de nyid mchog
36a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid// grub pa gang zhig de brten pa// der ni rgyal ba kun 'byung ba// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod// ces bya'o// dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i// tshigs su bcad pa lnga brgyar ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i
36a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod// pad+ma rdo rje'i dga' bas thob gyur bsod nams gang yin pas// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sar gyur 'jig rten gyur pa yon tan brgyun gnas pa// sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur gsang bu grub pa
36a5(rgyud 'grel): gtan du nyin dang mnyan du sbyor gyur cig/ sems can 'di kun ma lus byang chub snying po'i bar du legs par spyod gyur cig/ gang zhig rgya mtsho dang bcas sa gzhi ri dang ljon shing sogs pas brgyan pa rnams// de dag de nyid
36a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bzhin du chen por gyur pa'i khongs su chud par snang gyur pa/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub dri med zla ba'i 'od zer dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa mchogamadzad pa thugs rjes gzhan gyis dbang phyug gyur
36b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan pad+ma rdo rje gco la phyag 'tshal lo// / don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems
36b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mnyes par bya ba las// don dam pa'i slob dpon gyi mchod pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma lus pas/
36b3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi pad+ma bzung la me tog gis phreng bas mchod pa dpal mgon po bde ba chen po pad+ma badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing
36b4(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
37a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyi med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs mes bya ba dpal mos mdzad pa bzhugs so//
37b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyo ba ya bi ni shwA ma sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o//
37b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dri ma med cing thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi// yang dag ma yin kun rtog mtha' dag dri mas ma gis chos sku dang ni mtshungs med pa'i// ngo mo chos char gyi gzhir gyur longs spyod dang ni
37b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa yi gzugs dang spyod ldan pa'i// yang dag sprul pa skye 'gyur de la gus par phyag byas nas ni de nyid bshad par bya// de yi rang bzhin mi shes pa'i// skye bo ma lus la phan phyir// dpal ldan yan lago med rdo
37b4(rgyud 'grel): rje/ bdag gi de nyid mdor bsdu bya// byis pas 'khrul pa'i bden min pa'i// kun tu rtog pa las byung dngos// kun tu rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// de ni srid par mkhas pas bshad// de las bzod dka' rgyun chags pa'i// nyon
37b5(rgyud 'grel): mongs ma lus tshogs rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che ba'i// las kyi tshogs ni skye bar 'gyur// de gnyis las ni skye ba dang // 'chi ba la sogs rab rgyas pa// mi bden la zhen sems ldan pa'i// shin tu sdug bsngal 'khor
37b6(rgyud 'grel): mor 'byung // shes rab nyams chung de dag ni// ji srid dngos 'dzin chen po yod// de srid srid pa'i brtson rar gnas// bdag dang gzhan phan ga la yod// de phyir 'gro ba gsum po dag/ dga' bar byed 'dod rang gi ni//
38a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa gsal bar 'dod pa yi// bshes gnyen can gyi dngos 'dzin spyang // gal te ming tsam tha dad kyang // rtog pa nyid du dbyer myed phyir// mkhas pas dngos 'dzin yongs btang ste// dngos med par yang
38a2(rgyud 'grel): mi brtag go/ mar me 'bar ba bsang rung gi/ shi na ci yang byar med par// dngos por 'dzin pa nyid rung gi/ dngos med 'dzin pa de ltar min// yang dag dngos po med rtog pa// de yi dngos po mtshon 'gyur te// gang phyir na mkha'
38a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig pa ni// med pas dang po bral ba min// thabs dang bral bar gyur pa yi// dngos med tsam zhig sgrub gyur kyang // med phyir na mkha'i me tog bzhin// bdag gzhan don ni nus ma yin// mig 'phrul lta bur 'khrul pa'i phyir// de ltar
38a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po yongasu btang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// med phyir dngos med de bzhin no// de gnyis ji ltar yongs btang dang // btang nas gang du gnas pa ni// 'khor min mya ngan 'das min pa// de ni mkhas pas mnyan par gyis// shes
38a5(rgyud 'grel): dang shes bya rab phye ste// sbyor bas yongs su brtags nas ni// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// shes rab de nyid du ni brjod// ma lus sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dang // sdug bsngal las 'don gang yin pa// snying rje sems can la chags pas//
38a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags zhes ni bya bar grags// rtag tu rjes mthun sbyor ba yi// skye bo mngon par 'dod pa yi// 'bras bu gang yin nyer sbyin pas// de nyid thabs zhes bya bar bsgrags// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin// gnyis med rnam par sbyor ba yis//
38b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po 'dus pa gang yin pa// shes rab thabs zhes bya bar brjod// de ltar gang la bzhag pa dang // gsal bar nus pa ma yin zhing // bzhag dang bsal ba spangs pa ni// chos rnams de bzhin nyid ces brjod// bzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba//
38b2(rgyud 'grel): yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs shing // mtshan gzhi dang ni mtshan nyid grol// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// gnyis dang gnyis med zhi ba dang // thams cad la gnas dge ba ste// so so rang rig mi g.yo zhing // thabs dang shes rab mi 'khrugs pas// /
38b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa'i gnas// legs dang lha yi phun tshogs byed// chos kyi dbyingasu rab tu grags// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste// yid 'ong bdag byin brlabs pa
38b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// theg pa gsum dang sku gsum dang // bye ba grangs med sngags dang ni// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'jig rten pa dang de las 'das// lha dang lha min mi dang ni// yaM dgas la sogs de bzhin gzhan
38b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid las ni byung nas su// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur// ma lus pa yi 'gro rnams la// yid bzhin nor ltar kun tu gnas// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// spyod dang grol ba yang dag gsol// de nyid yang dag rtogs nas su// sngon gyi
38b6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs sangs rgyas la// thams cad du ni sangs rgyas zhing // 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur// dpag med bde ba'i rang bzhin phyir// dpal ldan bde chen zhes bya ba la// kun tu bzang po mchog nyid dang // mngon par byang chub byed pa po//
39a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba gsum gyi sdug bsngal ma lus pa// 'joms par byed pa gcig pu rab 'jug dang ni dpag med sna tshogs pa'i// tshogs la chags pa las ni rnam grol blo mchog mnyam
39a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa// bdag gzhan phan dang bde rgyu de nyid du ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs// de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsgrub pa las// shes rab dang thabs rnam par spros pa'i rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// /
39a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa gzhom dka' 'khrul pa yin// nad kyis gzhom pa dag la phan pa dang // de nyid rin chen thob bya'i phyir// de nas 'di la cung zad bshad// dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje// snying rjer zhugs pa'i sems kyis ni// sngon gyi sangs
39a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// thabs ni ji bzhin mdor bsdu bya// de 'di yin zhes rgyal bas kyang // de ni brjod par nus ma yin// so so rang rig rang bzhin phyir// ngag gi lam ni bzung bya min// de lta na yang dus gsum gyi// spangs
39a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'gro rnams dgra mdzad pas// mdo sde du ma gsang sngags kyi// spyod pa la sogs rim gyis bshad// sgra dang don dag 'brel med phyir// thos pa la sogs shes pa yis// yul du nam yang 'gyur ma yin// bstan bcos
39a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ston pa yin// de phyir skyes bu dam pa yis// bla ma dam pa brten pa'i rigs// de ma gtogs par de nyid ni// bskal pa bye bas thob mi 'gyur// zhing bzang shin tu sbyangs pa las// sa bon med pa'i myu gu bzhin//
39b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rin chen ma rnyed par// nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin// rnam par mi rtog lam la gnas// thabs dang shes rab don ston pa'i// man ngag ldan pa 'ga' tsam ste// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // sa steng gi ni slob
39b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon te// nges par yongasu shes byas la// dngos grub mchog ni bdag sgrub phyir// de ni 'bad pas bsnyen bskur bya// gang zhig gis ni gzi brjid kyis// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// 'byung po kun gyi dge legs dang //
39b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag med byang chub bde mchog thob// ltos pa med par thugs brtse ba'i// thugs rje'i sku can de la ni// bsam ngan rgyu yi dri bcas pa'i// sems kyis ci phyir 'dud par byed// ji srid 'dod pa rnyed bar du// kun tu phyag dang bkur sti dang // /
39b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de tshang la sogs pas mchod// bsnyen bkur sri zhu bla mar byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas// rin chen de nyid thob gyur nas// sdang las skyon rnams rtog byed cing // 'dri med tsam yang byed mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzhan
39b5(rgyud 'grel): yang ngan pa'i bdag/ bla ma rdo rje can brten nas// co 'dri bar ni byed pa'i bdag/ bsam ngan rang la co 'dri 'am// dkon mchog gsum gyi bskor dang ni// bla ma'i phyag rgya 'phrog par byed// rnal 'byor po yi dam chos la// ma spyad pas
39b6(rgyud 'grel): na dmod par byed// dam tshig ngo mtshar che gyur la// rtag tu smod byed blo ldan la// nga yang shin tu skrag byed ces// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs// bsnyen bkur med par myur ba ru// bdag ni rjesu bzung 'tshal brjod// sdang ba'i
40a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis gzhan brten te// kha cig nyes pa sgrogs la brtson// sangs rgyas dron du mi gnyer zhing // rnal 'byor pa dang slob dpon zhes// bdag ni ci nas shes 'gyur ba// de tsam la ni zhugs pa yin// brgya la ye shes
40a2(rgyud 'grel): rnyed 'gyur na// khengs pa bla ma las sdang bar// sngags kyi rim pa las 'ongs pa// 'di ni bdag gis shes zhes brjod// slar la 'bul gyi yas rang bzung // de nas brtsams te yas kyis ni// slob ma nga min slob dpon min// khro bcas
40a3(rgyud 'grel): smra ba gzhan dag yod// bla ma slu ba'i bsam pa yi// co 'dri byed cing khyad byed pa// tshe 'di bde ba yod min na// de dag ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sems can gang // rang gi don la rgyab phyogs yin// de ni ngan 'gro kun snod du//
40a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs// bdag nyid sun 'byin byed pa de// dmyal las 'gro ba gzhan yod min// shin tu mi zad las rnams kyis// sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos 'tshed// de bas dam pa don gnyer ba'i// skyes bus
40a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po thams cad kyis// dpag med 'bras bu rab ster bya'i// slob dpon kun tu brten par bya// byang chub tu ni nges byas pas// phrag dog nga rgyal ser sna dang // de bzhin g.yo dang sgyu dang ni// skyo dub 'du shes yongs spangs te//
40a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu ngu yi spyod pa bzhin// mi g.yo ba yi sems kyis ni// dngos grub kun don ster ba'i bla// 'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya// shin tu gus pas dus gsum du// zhabs la spyi bos phyog byas shing // rang gi lus la'ang
40b1(rgyud 'grel): ltos med par// maN+Dal sngon 'gro mchod pa bya// de nas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// de nyid dam pa bgegs med par// slob ma yis ni thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'od gsal dag pa ste//
40b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i gnas 'gyur byang chub sems// gsal ba chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos// phun tshigs ma lus byed par 'gyur// mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa'i// nyi ma dang ni nye ba yi// me shel gyi ni nor bu las// rab 'bar me lce 'byung
40b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin// slob me'i sems ni nor bu la// 'gro ba gzigs pa nyer 'gyur na// dri ma 'joms byed rnal 'byor gyi// me lho rno 'bar de bzhin no// dpal ldan de nyid rin chen ni// rab tu rtogs pas 'bar rjes la// phyogs bcun bzhugs
40b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rjes thugs ni 'phangs nas su// myur du byin nas slob ma ni// sangs rgyas byin rlag / don mi za// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur// brtan pas g.yo dang zil
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dang nga rgyal sgrib pa thams cad yong su spangs nas ni// man ngag ldan pa'i bla ma mtshungs pa med pa dad pas 'dir ni bsten par bya// nges de nges par rgyal ba'i yon tan gter 'gyur de nyid rin chen rnyed gyur nas// bde gshegs kun
40b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis brnyes pa'i byang chub mchog ni 'thob par 'gyur// de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub paM las rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur nges par brtan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// rdo rje sems pa
41a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'dod pa'i// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// dbang bskur srid gsum phun tshogs gnas// de nas 'di la yang dag bshad// bde gshegs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyud kyi lam gyi rjes 'brangs
41a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// mkhas pas gang tshe dbang bskur na// sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum yin// dpag med 'jig rten khams dbang phyug/ bdag byin brlab pa'i dbang thob pa// dam tshig nyams kyi 'jigs pas ni// blo ldan de dag gis kyang
41a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sngags kyi lam las de bzhin gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lho'i// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'i// sngags kyi lam du de bzhin gsungs// de bas don kun la
41a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas// dbang bskur don gnyer rgyal bdag sras// rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho// ji ltar rig pas bsnyen par bya// gzugs dang lung tsho phun sum tshogs// mig bzang phyag rgya rnyed nus ni// gos dang tsan dan phreng
41a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis// rab tu brgyan te dbul bar bya// dri dang phreng sogs bsnyen bkur dang // chang dang ston mo rgya chen dang // phyag rgyar bcas pa'i gtso bos ni// gus pas 'bad de yang dag mchod// slob mas dad pas pus lha nga //
41a6(rgyud 'grel): sa la legs par btsugs nas ni// thal sbyor bcas pa'i bstod pa 'dis// ston pa la ni gsol gang ba bya// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa ya// stong nyid snying po bstod phyag 'tshal// kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can// ye shes
41b1(rgyud 'grel): sku khyod phyag 'tshal la// 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po// bdag don de nyid ston mdzad pa// chos bdag med las yang dag byung // rdo rje sems khyod la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang // sa dang pha rol phyin yon
41b2(rgyud 'grel): ta ni// rtog tu mgon po khyod las byung // byang chub sems khyod la phyag 'tshal// dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen gyi// de nyid brtan dang g.yo bcas pa// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i sa bon khyod la 'dud// 'gro don
41b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad// sangs rgyas sras po khyod la 'dud// yon tan rgya mtsho bka' drin gyi// de nyid bla med shes par 'tshal// kun mkhyen ye shes
41b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba// da ltar bka' drin mdzad du gsol// dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po// rdo rje chos la bstan pa bzhin// de ring mgon po bka' drin gsol// khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni// bdag la gzhan
41b5(rgyud 'grel): ni skyabs ma mchis// 'khor ba'i dgra las rab rgyal ba'i// mgon pos de phyir brtse bar mdzod// de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni// phan pa'i bsam pas rjes brtse bas// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang ba'i//
41b6(rgyud 'grel): drilo bu sil spyan sgra dang bcas// bla raM 'bar ba bres pa ru// me tog bdug pa nyams dga' 'khrigs// phreng ba dri zhim mchog tu bde// rdo rje sems dpa' lan gyi lha// rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor ldan// mchog tu rmad byung gnas gyur pa'i/
42a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lor bkugs nas ni// de nas slob dpon bskal bzangs kyis// phyag rgya dang ni sbyar byas te// rgyal ba'i gnas gyur byang chub sems// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni// bkra shis glu yi tshigs bcad
42a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gdugs dang rnga yab rgyal mtshan bcas// phyag rgyar ldan pas slob ma ni// 'gro ba'i gtso bor dbang bskur bya// slob dpon dbang phyug mchog gis ni// dbang bskur rin chen byin nas su// rang bzhin gsal zhing mngon sbyangs pa//
42a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams dga' sbyin par bya// rin chen chen po ga bur bcas// tsan ngan dmar po sbyar ba dang // rdo rje yi ni chu dang bcas// lnga pa dag las yang dag byung // 'di ni bu khyod dam tshig ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs//
42a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos rtag tu bskyang bar byos// de ni ston pa mnyan par gyis// srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing // bud med rin chen spang mi bya// khyod kyi slob dpon yong mi spang // sdom pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur
42a5(rgyud 'grel): bas// slob ma sdig dang bral bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sras mchog de la ni// rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin// byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par// phyogs kyi 'khor lo kun tu ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa// sems can mchog gis
42a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba gyis// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin bdag/ yid bzhin nor ltar rgya che ba// chags dang bral zhing mi skyo bas// da ni sems can rnams don gyis// rjes gnang bcas pa'i dbang bskur thob// bya ba byas shing rab dga' bas//
42b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun dga' bar byed pa yi// 'jam pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya// de ring bdag gson 'bras bu yod// de ring skye ba 'bras bu yod// de ring sangs rgyas rigasu skyes// de ring sangs rgyas sras por gyur// skye la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang // nyon
42b2(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'dam ni rgal dka' ba'i// rtog pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen las// mgon pos de ring bdag bsgral to// khyod zhabs bka' drin shes nas su// byang chub gang gis bdag 'tshal ba'i// bag chags thams cad spangs nas su// rdzogs pa'i bzhin
42b3(rgyud 'grel): du bdag 'gyur ro// mig mngangs 'dzum dang bcas pa yi// gus pas zhabs la btung nas su// 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// rdzas ni gang dang gang bzhed pa// de dang de ni dbul bar bya// bla ma thugs rje can gyis kyang // slob ma'i 'dzin pa
42b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa'i phyir// de la phan phyir blang bar bya// bla ma'i yon ni phul nas su// de nas mchod de phyag byas la// mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas// slar yang 'dir yi mkhyen par gsol// de ring sangs rgyas mchog khyod kyis// bka' drin bdag
42b5(rgyud 'grel): gis thob par 'gyur// de mthus bla med byang chub ni// ji bzhin bdag gis sgrub par bgyi// mchog kun gyis ni mchod pa'i gnas// bla med byang chub thob nas ni// srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can gnas// de nyid la ni dgod par bgyi// cho ga 'di
42b6(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid kyi dbang bskur byin nas ni// slob ma'i lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis brtag byas la// zab cing rgya che ba la lhag par mos na ni// tshig gi rin chen dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob par gyur pa de// rdo rje mchog 'dzin
43a1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed dka' mtshungs pa med pa'i gnas// longs spyod rdzogs pa dang ni dpal gyi zhing gyur pa// byang chub sems chen dbang bskur blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa las/ byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ba nges par bstan pa rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// / gzhan dron la phan brtson 'grus can// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa mchog/ de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya// gang zhig bsgoms pas 'khor ba yi//
43a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung rgal dka'i rgya mtsho min// rang don tsam gyis mya ngan 'das// der yang rnal 'byor pa mi gnas// gang zhig rab kyi mthar phyin pas// dri med rmad byung sangs rgyas nyid// 'phel dang 'grib las rnam grol ba'i// bla med byang chub skye 'gyur ba'o//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): phung po lnga la sogs chos rnams// gang yang dor bar bya min zhing // nam yang gzung bar bya ba'ang min// chos kun mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid// stong nyid sgom par bya min la// stong nyid min pa'ang mi sgom mo// stong nyid rnal 'byor pas mi gtang //
43a5(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid min pa'ang yongs mi btang // stong nyid stong min nyid 'dzin pa// rtog pa rab rgyas skye bar 'gyur// yongs su btang ba'ang rtog pa ste// de bas de gnyis yongasu spangs// 'dzin pa gnyis ka yongs btang na// tshogs bral rnam par
43a6(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i gnas// de dang 'brel bdag ces pa yang // kun rtog de phyir de gnyis spangs// chags pa med cing 'gyur ba med// sdig pa dang bral mngon zhen med// thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol// mkhas pas na mkha' lta bur bsgom// snying rje
43b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas sems can la// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya'o// sem+b+has can+d+ra yod dang myed ces par// rnam rtog nyid ni mi bya'o// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang // shes rab ces byar rab tu grags// yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin du// ma lus 'gro
43b2(rgyud 'grel): don byed snying rje// mi dmigs gnas kyis shes rab dang // mi dmigs snying rje chen po ste// na mkha' la ni na mkha' bzhin// blo ldan lhan cig gnyi su med// gang na'ang bsgom pa po med cing // rnam par bsgom pa'ang ci yang med// bsgom bya nyid kyang
43b3(rgyud 'grel): yod min pa// de ni de nyid bsgom parwa bshad// bya ba'ang cung zad yod min la// dpyad par bya ba nyid kyang med// byed po dpyod pa las grol ba// don dam rnam par bsgom pa yin// gtong bar byed pa'ang yod min zhing // 'gog par byed pa'ong ci yang
43b4(rgyud 'grel): med// des na dor bar bya med cing // 'di la blang bya gang yang med// gzugs rnams kun tu blta ba dang // de bzhin sgra rnams nyan pa dang // rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang // ro rnams sna tshogs myang ba dang // las rnams thams cad byed pa ni// sems ni
43b5(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo gnas byas nas// de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// rnal 'byor rgyun tu skye bar 'gyur// de nyid gnyis med brtan pa ste// byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid// pha rol
43b6(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa kun dngos kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di nyid// 'di ni mnyamo nyid brjod pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsgom pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs// brtan dang g.yo ba'i bangs
44a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// 'gro ba thams 'di las skyes// dngos dang dngos myed dang bral ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba// bsgom pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// nyes pa ma lus dang bral byeng //
44a2(rgyud 'grel): nges par sdug bsngal ldog 'gyur na// dpal ldan pade gshegs yon tan nI// mtha' yas de las 'byung bar 'gyur// kun rtog mun pa sdug bsngal ba// stug pos mngon par zil genon cing // 'dod tshigs la sogs bzlog bka'i dri
44a3(rgyud 'grel): mas g.yogs gyur pa'i// rab tu 'thor rlung gis bskyod grogs ltar g.yo ba yi// sems ni 'khor ba yin par rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rtog pa las ni rnam par grol zhing 'od gsal ba// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma'i sgrib g.yogs rab tu
44a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa med na de nyid ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i don du sems can mchog gis gsungs// de bas sdug bsngal mang po tshogs kyi rgyur gyur pa// 'di las gzhan pa gang yang yod pa ma yin la// thar 'dod 'phags pa
44a5(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi bde ba dpag med pa// skye ba'i rgyur yang 'di las gzhan pa gang yang med// sdug bsngal ma lus zad bya'i go cha bgos nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob par 'dod pa yi// sems ni brtan byas de la 'bad de du pyad byas
44a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de yi rang bzhin bdag gi rang bzhin nyid du bya// skye ldan rnams kyi yid 'di ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa snam bu 'thug pos dkris gyur pa// de srid sdug bsngal dpag tu med yin de nas de ni ji srid bshus par gyur pa na// de srid bde ba rgya chen
44b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med yin pas 'phags mchog de la nan tan gyis shig dang // de zad nas ni de nyid la gnas yon tan rgyas pa rang nyid kyis ni snang bar 'gyur// de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las de kho na nyid
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// // chos kun mnyam nyid rmad 'byung ba// de nyid spyod pa bla na med// rnam rtog dgra rnams gsod byed pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhan rdzogs sangs rgyas la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas la
44b3(rgyud 'grel): phan bya'i phyir// de nyid yan lag med rdo rjes// de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya// rga ba la sogs rba rlabs 'khrigs// skye ba'i rgya mtshor cher 'jigs las// 'byung po thams cad sgrol ba'i gru// nyos med par ni 'gro ba'i gru/ yid 'ong yon tan
44b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas// myur du dngos grub bzang po byed// 'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub po// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // ma lus pa yi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyur 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu bsngags pa ste// 'di ma gtogs par
44b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub skye bar 'gyur ba min// de phyir thar pa 'dod pas spyod pa mnyam med 'di spyad bya// lha min sgra dang brgya byin grong khyer gsum dgra nor sbyin tshangs sogs rnaMs kyi zhab kyi pad+mar mchod byas pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phangs mchog ni
44b6(rgyud 'grel): myur du thob byed sdig pa zad byed 'di ni mkhas pas spyad par bya// dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'gro la phan phyir yang dag spyod pa 'di gsungs te// sna tshogs gzhan dag ma lus gdul bya'i skye bo du ma'i dbang du byas nas ni// ji skad gsungs
45a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs bla med dngos grub ma lus rab sgrub min// kun bzang mtshungs med spyod pa 'di las 'grub 'gyur bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can// mgon la kun nas phyag byas la// @/
45a2(rgyud 'grel): ba byas pa'i blo can gyis// gsang ba'i spyod pa brten par bya// de nas rang 'dod nges byas la// 'du 'dzi kun la rgyu ba phyogs te// seng ge'i bdag nyid kun rgyu ba// de nyid ldan pas spyad par bya// 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// ji bzhin yang dag don
45a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pas// yang dag ldan pas 'jug pa bdag/ gnas med sems ni brtan par bya// khams gsum 'di dag de nyid de// phung po khams la sogs mtshan nyid// thams cad sgyu mo rmi lam bzhin// mdor bsdus 'di ltar shes byas las// 'gyod dang
45a4(rgyud 'grel): rmugs dang gnyid la sogs// longs spyod rgya chen 'du 'dzi dang // de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad po// shin tu thag ring spang bar bya// gnyis med nges par byas nas ni// rtag tu g.yo ba med pa yis// pha rol phyin drug sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub
45a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par bya// sems can rnam par mi rtog bzhin// sems can don la shin tu chags// sems ni byang chub nges byas la// de nyid spyod pa la brten bya// shes rab thabs su ldan pa yis// chags pa kun la rgyab brtan te// de nyid goms pa la 'bang
45a6(rgyud 'grel): pasaHtshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bdag byin brlab par rab gsal bas// sems ni ji ltar rjes mthun par// sngags kyi lam las rab bshad pa'i// dam tshig dag ni kun spyad bya// bgegs dang bdud tshogs zhi bya'i phyir// bdud rtsi lnga
45b1(rgyud 'grel): bo byin gyis brlabs// bshang gci la sogs rnams gnas pa// 'di ni bsrung ba bla med yin// rims ngang dug dang dbyig dug nang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyi 'tshe// bdud dang log 'dren nyid dag ni// 'di yi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mi dang rnga mo las byung dang //
45b2(rgyud 'grel): rta dang glang po las byung ba// lnga pa khyi las byung ba ste// sgron ma shes rab can gyi bza'// sems ni dga' bar byed pa yi// dam tshig chen po gzhan dag kyang // rlung ni 'khrug pa zhi bya'i phyir// thugs kyi rdo rje can mnyes bya// thams cad du ni thar 'dod pas// shes rab
45b3(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin brten bya// dam pa'i don du gang gnas pa// kun rdzob dag pa'i lus bzung nas// bud med mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis ni// thams cad du ni kun tu gnas// de bas phyi rol don las byung // rdo rje mgon pos don de gsungs// bram ze rigs sogs/
45b4(rgyud 'grel): las byung dang // mtha' las skyes dang phyag rgya dang // gzhan gyi chung ma tshul nyams dang // dman dang cha lugs mi sdug dang // skyed ma dang ni sgyug mo dang // rang gi bu mo sring mo dag/ de nyid sbyor bas don spyod na// sgrub po myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
45b5(rgyud 'grel): sems ni tshim par byed pa yi// gling bu sogs las byung ba mnyan// phyi rol phyag rgya ka ra na// ro ni sna tshogs tshim byed bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog rnams kyis// sems ni rin chen dag bya'i phyir// rtag tu bdag nyid
45b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya// chu skyes rdo rje chu dang ni// sgron ma'i 'o ma rab rgyas mchod// phreng dang tsan dan gos bzang sogs// sems ni skyo ba med par bya// bgrod dang bgrod min sogs pa ni// 'dir ni nam yang bya ba min// sgyu ma lta bu sogs sbyor bas//
46a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la ni longs spyod bya// chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na// mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spyad bya// sgrub pa po lnga phan gdags phyir// khams
46a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ni ma lus pa// 'di dag thams cad longs spyod phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa yin// ye shes mtha' yas rnyed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs la'ang phyag min na// rtag tu bsgom la 'grus pa yis// lugs ma la sogs smos
46a3(rgyud 'grel): ci dgos// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// de bas bdag nyid lha yin no// sbyang ba dang ni dkyil 'khor 'bri// phyag rgya bcing dang mchod rten las// sbyin sreg dang ni
46a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzlos// po ti klog pa la sogs pa// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon po yis// mos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ni// gzhan dag la ni badzin pa ste// de nyid rig pa'i sems kyis min// mar sar 'dod pas snying po ni// blangs te da
46a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dor bar byed// da ltar chos kyi snying thob pas// rtog pa ma lus spang bar bya// rnam par mI rtog gla nas blo can// gnas min ngogs pa spang byas na// thugs kyi rdo rje bka' bzhin du// de nas 'grub 'gyur the tshom meng // phyag rgya sbyor ba
46a6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'khyud// rdo rje bcug ste bskyod pa dang // ma mchu'i spang mchog btung bya zhing // de yi mgrin pa'i sgra gsal ba/ blang zhing dul bas longs spyad na// nges par dga' ba rgya chen gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa'i rgya'o// ring por mi
46b1(rgyud 'grel): thogs 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar yid 'khrugs mi 'gyur bas// de lta de ltar spyad par bya// sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrugs gyur na// nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin// de bas dngos grub mchog 'dod pa'i// grub pa pos ni 'dzin pa
46b2(rgyud 'grel): spyad/ sems dang rjes 'thun sbyor ba yis// dngul chu bzung bar bsgrub ji bzhin// thabs kyi gzhi yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin sems kyi dngul chu bzung // sbyor ba dag ni gang yin pa// de ru de yi gnas par bya// dus dang grangs ni
46b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs spangs nas// de nyid rig pas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med mtshungs pa med pa gang yin nyin re zhing // de nyid mchog ni rgyun tu rjes su bsten par bya// 'di yi dri ma med cing rdo rje lta bu dang // grib ma lta bu sku ni mtshungs med
46b4(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// blo dang ldan pas shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun// mchog gi go 'uphang sgrub par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni dri ma med por rnam 'byed do// 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir// nyin rur brtson
46b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grus go cha chen po bgos nas su// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems// yon tan ma lus pa yi gter gyur bsgom par bya// sems ni byang chub ngo bor gzhig nas yul gyi ni// bde la dga' bas tshe 'di nyid la
46b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur// rang bzhin gyis ni ma lus 'di dag rnam dag ste// tha mal yul rnams bdag med sgyu ma lta bu dang // mig 'phrul dang ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs pa ste// gnas med rtog pa'i tha snyad dag las rnam par
47a1(rgyud 'grel): grol// gang cha skyes bu dag pa rgya che bsam pa dang // 'dzin pa med pa'i sems ni kun tu rtogs 'gyur ba// de tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i rtog pa zil mnan te// yul 'di rnams kyi nus pa 'ching bar nus ma yin// gang rnams rnyed dang ma
47a2(rgyud 'grel): rnyed grags dang ma grags dang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rab tu rgyas pa dang // bstod dang smad pa'i dri ma rab tu ma lus pa// zad pa rang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid du bya// chags pa myed dang 'gro la snying ni brtse ba yi// rnam par rtog pa thams
47a3(rgyud 'grel): cad las grol spyod pa dang // ldan pa de yi phyag na bde gshegs go 'phang ni// gnas pa ma yin zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gsungs// gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i blo can gyi// skye bo gshis ngan kha yi bu ga ni// zab mo gya gyu nas byung tshig
47a4(rgyud 'grel): dAn sprul// rtsub mo'i las kyi su zhig 'jigs mi 'gyur// shin tu dri med dga' byed 'od kyi phreng can gyi// 'od zer 'tsho skyes kyis ni bzod par mi nus ltar// yid 'phrog byed pa'i bdud rtsi mang du bshad pa yang // skye bo 'dzings min yid
47a5(rgyud 'grel): ni chags par byed pa min// zla ba'i 'od zer de nyid chu shel nor bu dang // shin tu nye bar 'dus nas bdud rtsi chu 'dzag bzhin// de nyid skye bo bzang yid bdud rtsi ros bArla na zhing // mi gnas mchi ma 'dzag bzhin tshogs par byed// de bas
47a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni chos nyid gnas pa'i skye bo bzang // 'phags pa shes ldan khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni// bdag gis mdo ru bsdus te gsal bar bya ba ni// rab mchog gang yin de ni khyod la dbul bar bgyi// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas

47b4(rgyud 'grel): xxx/ xxx

47b6(rgyud 'grel): xxx/ xxx
48a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes grul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs dbang po'i blos mdzad pa bzugs s+ho/
48b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na sid+d+hi nA ma sU d+ha no bI kA/ bod skad du/ ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub ni// ma mkha' lta bur khyab gyur pa/
48b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mchog mchod dang bcas pa yi// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje mchog/ sems can kun la kun gsol ba'o// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal te// dngos grub kun la bdag gus pas// sgrub pa'i rim 'di bshad par bya// ma lus sbyor rgyud las
48b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// rmongs pa gang gis mi shes pa// de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam// gang zhig rtog pa kun spangs pa'i// de nyid la ni yang dag gnas// sgrub pa po de tshe 'di yis// byang chub dam par gnas pa 'gyur//
48b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sngogs// bzlas dang bsgom la 'bad pa yis// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du'ang // dngos grub mchog ni thob mi 'gyur// gzugs dang lang tshe phun sum tshogs// longs spyod dbang phyug stobs rnams dang //
48b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang rgyud dang gtsor 'gyur ba'i// sems la nga rgyal bcang mi bya// bdag ni blo ldan mkhas pa dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad la// mkhas pa dag ni rgyal po zhes// sems ni bskyed par mi bya'o// tshul khrims ldan zhing thos ldan
48b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan// sbyin pa la sogs yang dag ldan// bshad dang gzhan yang ma bshad pas// bdag tu dmigs par mi bya zhing // sems can kun gyi yid khyab par// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid zhugs// de ltar bsams nas rnal 'byor gyis// dbang
49a1(rgyud 'grel): bos gang la'ang brnyas mi bya// byis pa blun dang dbul po dang // tshul khrims 'tshul cing nad kyis gzir// de la sogs pa dpag med dang // yang dag ldan yang brnyas mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus// byang chub
49a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis rnam par brgyan// sems can kun la rje su brtse// dam tshig dang ni sdom la gnas// dri chen dmar dang sha nyid dag/ byang chub sems dang rab sras la// chu chen dang ni yang dag ldan// de nyid rig pas rtag tu bza'// mi khyi rta dang pa
49a3(rgyud 'grel): lang smon// sna can dang ni khur skyed kyi'ang // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs la// de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya// srid gsum las byung bsang bya zhing // pha rol nor ni 'phrog pa dang // gzhan gyi bud med la 'dod spyod// brdzun gyi tshig ni smra bar
49a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ las gang gis ni sems can+da rnams// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang // mi zang dmyal bar 'tshed 'gyur ba// des ni rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur// thabs chen yang dag ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor 'jig rten don sgrub pa// sems can
49a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis smad pa yi// bya ba de la mi bya med// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa la// sdig par grags pa yod med ces// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa las// rdo rje can ni nyid kyis gsungs// bza' dang bza' min las 'das dang // btung dang
49a6(rgyud 'grel): btung min rnam par spangs// bgrong dong bgrong min rnam grol bdag/ rnal 'byor pa ni mnyam 'jog 'gyur// rten 'brel las byung yang dag dngos// dngos po thams cad rnam par brtag/ 'gro 'ong dag las rnam grol zhing // skye ba med pa
49b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag med can// sgyu ma 'dra sogs dpe yis ni// de rnams sbyor bar rab shes pas// nga dang bdag ni rnam rtog dag/ de nyid shes pas der mi bya// rdo rje chen pos kun khyab cing // nam mkha' kun la rab tu zhugs// sems can kun gyi yid
49b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab cing // bsod nams thams cad 'byung ba che// phun tshun khyab mdzad rdo rje ni// kun rig 'jig rten 'dren pa po// de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// rgyud rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin// gang la bla ma'i drin yod pa// de yi de nyid mchod rten
49b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gzhan du byis pas yun ring du// rnam par rmongs pras nyon mongs 'gyur// bla mas sangs rgyas chos 'gyur cing // dge 'dun yang ni de bzhin te// de yi drin gyis shes 'gyur pas// de bas dkon mchog gsum yin no//
49b4(rgyud 'grel): mi shes rab rib kyis ljongs la// 'di ni lam rab ston byed yin// bde ba kun gyi mchog 'gyur dang // 'dod pa thams cad rab ster yin// zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i bdag/ shin tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can// dkon mchog gsum rnams
49b5(rgyud 'grel): don du gnyer// chos sbyin pa la zang zing med// bla ma de ni slob ma sdud// sangs rgyas kun rjes sgrub byed cing // 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bka' stsal te// gzhan dag bla ma min par bshad// de bas de dang mnyam pa yi// mchod bya blo chen
49b6(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// brtul zhugs can ni bla mchog mchod// ngo snyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na// khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// rdo rje sems nyid 'jig rten na// phun sum tshogs kun phyir zhugs yi ni//
50a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma phun tshogs mchog 'dod cing // bsod nams mi zad 'dod pa dang // bgegs kun rnam par bzlog byed pas// rnam pa du mas mnyes par bya// dam tshig dag ni thams cad kyis// bla med dam tshig 'di yin te//
50a2(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs kun ster ba'o// brtson ldan rnams kyis rtag tu bsrung // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// ye shes mchog bzang thob pa yi// rdo rje ye shes dbang bskur bas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// yang dag ye shes
50a3(rgyud 'grel): kun ldan na// bris pa'i dkyil 'khor logs gzhan du// dbang bskur ba ni len ce na// 'di ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas sdug bsngal ni// lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni// de yi don rnams nyams 'gyur zhing //
50a4(rgyud 'grel): myur ba nyid du shi bar 'gyur// shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang // myong nas gnas las 'phos gyur na yang // gdol pa 'am dman pa'i rigs su skye// lkugs pa 'am yang na 'on pa'am// skye
50a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing skye bar dmus long du// skye bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// rdo rje ye shes zhes byar bshad// blo ldan de yi dbang bskur na// dbang bskur bar ni shes par bya// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas kun bdog
50a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ 'gro ba'i bdag po lha sogs pa'i// tshogs kyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// byas nas mngon par phyag byed 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen dang // bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kyang // dpal chen bsrung ba mdzad gyur/
50b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje sku yi rtag tu bzhugs// bden pa'i chos 'dzin mi 'khrug cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni rab 'jug pa// byin gyis ba rlabs dang ldan pa rnams// gus dang bcas pas bsngags par mdzad// 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin gzhan// stobs
50b2(rgyud 'grel): chen pha rol gnon pa rnams// gnas rnams kun tu rtogs pa na'ang // bsrung bzhin du ni rab tu gnas// gang yang sems can thams cad la// bdud dang bgegasu gnas pa rnams// de yang de la mi byed de// bgegs rnams skrag
50b3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'byer bar 'gyur// lha la sogs dang grub pa rnams// mkha' la rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// ngan 'gror 'gro bas 'jigs pas na// de yang de la 'jigs mi byed// gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis ni// rnam par rmongs rnams mgon byed
50b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ brtson dang ye shes rnam shes dang // dngos grub dag kyang nyams par 'gyur// kun mkhyen mchog sbyin gsungs pa'o// dbyibs kun dang ni rnam bral zhing // 'gro dang 'ong las rnam grol bdag/ rlung kun gyis kyang bskyod mi nus//
50b5(rgyud 'grel): me yi phung pos mi tshig cing // chu rnams kyis kyang g.yengs mi 'gyur// rab tu 'bad pas mtshon tshwan// rnon pos kyang ni chod mi 'gyur// ji ltar mi gnas na mkha' ni// khyab cing mtshan nyid rnams dang bral/ 'di ni don dam de nyid de//
50b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes bla med yin// kun tu bzang po zhes bshad cing // phyag rgya chen po zhes kyang bya// 'di ni chos skur shes bya ste// me long ye shes zhes kyang bya// ji ltar gzugs brnyan me long la// rang nyid nges par snang ba ltar// de bzhin
51a1(rgyud 'grel): chos skur ye shes ni// snang bas me long zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes dang // rang gi dang ni 'gro ba'i yang // dngos nyid gcig pur thugs su chud// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// gdod nas dag
51a2(rgyud 'grel): cing skye ba med// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal ba// phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes pas// so sor rtog pa can zhes bshad// kun tu kun nas sangs rgyas kyis/ mdzad pa thams cad la 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad gcig pas// bya ba sgrub
51a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bshad do// gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib// thams cad las grol de yi tshe// rnal 'byor pa mchog rdo rje can// shin tu rnam dag ces bshad do// ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang // 'dod yon kun las sangs rgyas rnams// thams
51a4(rgyud 'grel): cad longs spyod gcig pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod do// mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan// sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa bas// sprul pa'i skur ni bshad pa yin// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub
51a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ shes nas rnal 'byor pas de bsgom// kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag mdzad pa// phyag rgya che zhes shes par bya// grub sde du ma'i rgyud rnams su// rnal 'byor mchog rnams la
51a6(rgyud 'grel): brtan te// mngal 'byung rig pa gang yin dang // nong dang zhing du so sor brtul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// der ni yang dge brtul zhugs 'dzin// gzhon nu'i rol pa thams cad deng // de bzhin bzo gnas yang dag brtan// btsun
51b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'khor las mngon 'byung zhing // bdud rnams 'dul bar mdzad nyid dang // lha yul nas ni 'bab pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan 'das chen yang dag brtan// gang yang rol pa gzhan rnams dang // thams
51b2(rgyud 'grel): cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las// rnal 'byor pas nA rtag tu bsgom// 'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med// sngon gnas pa ni sbyor mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad pa ni// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos bzhi pa// dus gsum lam gyi mthar
51b3(rgyud 'grel): thug pa// thams cad de bzhin lta bar bya// ngag gi spyod yul kun las 'das// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa// sangs rgyas nyid kun ster ba po// rnal 'byor 'di ltar bsam par bya// sa kun las ni rnal 'byor zhing // rgyu dang
51b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rnams spangs la// grub pa bzhin du rnal 'byor bsgom// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje can kun rnal 'byor pa// thabs kyi cho ga kun shos nus// rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung bzhin du// bla med de ni grub par
51b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'dug dang nyal dang gnas pa dang // yang na 'chag pa dag la yang // rdo rje tshig ni smra byed na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg/ brtul zhugs can ni rtag spyad tshe// sangs rgyas thams
51b6(rgyud 'grel): cad mchod pa ni// bya'o zhes ni yang dag spyod// de bzhin bza' dang gos sogs sam// gzhan yang ci yang rung ba dag/ sems can rnams la ci ster ba// cho ga de bzhin spyad par bya// glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang // me tog phreng
52a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rgyan rnams dang // rgun 'byung rngu yab gdugs rnams kyis// pha rol bdag nyid mchod par bya// dI bzangs rje yi byug pa sogs// chog bzhin du byugs pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran zhing // rnal 'phya/
52a2(rgyud 'grel): pas ni thams cad mchod// brtul zhugs can nam mgo bregs pa'am// khyim pa 'am bsnyen bkAr ba dag gam// rgyal po 'am ste dpon rnams kyang rlung // brtul zhugs rgyun gyis ji bzhin snang // rnal 'byor pa ni ci spyod pa// thams
52a3(rgyud 'grel): dzanr-i b+hU m-i \u0f88\u0f90/ ga pa kun las rnam grol byas// dzI ltar 'dod par bya pyod // don dngos bste// khyab padag pongs rgyas ni rang bzhin// rang ny-ing jis 'dong par spyod // sems can sngon gyi rnying la bzhugs// de nyid thams
52a4(rgyud 'grel): bla med pa// de nyid rnal 'byor dbang pos bsgom// rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun 'grub pa// rdo rje nyid ni myur thob 'gyur// 'dir ni bgegs med bdud kyang med// thams cad kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol//
52a5(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhags can gyi bdag nyid sgrug/ bdag nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// brtul zhugs me ldan gang tshe mthong // nyin zhag dang ni chud bral bar// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid 'grub 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi khyad par gyis// bdag
52a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid la ni rtag tu mchod// rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// phan tshun du yang de bzhin sbyin// sems can kun lus las byung dang // phyi sa las byung srog chags rnams// rnal 'byor chen pos legs blangs la// de nyid grub phyir bza'
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sgron ma mo dang yang dag ldan// smad ba'i dam tshig gzhan rnams dang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams rtag bza' zhing // ngo bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mchod// yan lag kun no spyad pa dang // brnyas pa dag tu mo bya ste// bud mod rigs kun las/
52b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba// rdo rje can gyis mchod par bya// me skyes me tog yang dag ldan// byang chub sems dang ldan pa dag/ mi rtog cho ga la gnas te// de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya// sme sha can gyi rigs las byung // sme sha can dang khyad par du// smad pa'i rigs
52b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba rnams// brten na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bram ze la sogs rigs las byung // bu mo rnal 'byor pas spyad de// ji ltar sems sun mi 'byin pa// de ltar shin tu mdzes par bya// sbrang ma skyugs pas 'dres pa dang // bshang la
52b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang bsres pa yi// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid mchod// ci 'dod bya ba byed pa dang // je dga' bar ni spyod pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub bya ste// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// brtul
52b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs sbyang ba sdom pa dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i// lha yi gzugasu bsgom pa yi// sgrub pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'dzam gling rdul phran mnyam pa yi// gsang sngags bzlas dang bsgom pa la// brtson pa che dang ldan gyur
52b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang / sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub ma 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dpag med pa'i// byas pa rnams kyis brtags tshul gyis// bde 'gro skye ba rnyed dka' na// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar 'gyur// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gzugs la sogs
53a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan thub pas gsungs pa ni// yang drag ye shes mnyam sbyor gyis// skal ba dang bral bdag nyid la'o// gang zhig rang rig ngo bo nyid// de nyid rin chen bla myed pa// lung dang rig pa'i tshul gyis ni// gang zhi
53a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par mi nus pa// mi shes rmongs pas kun tu khebs// spyod pa med pa'i blo can rnams// dang po'i las can rnal 'byor te// dman pa'i chos kyi snod yin te// 'gro ba mgon gyis de don du// rdo rje sems dpa'i sogs bsgom pa/
53a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog phyag mtshan kun ldan zhing // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsungs// gang yang gzhan rkyen khar ma las// zab mo'i ye shes dag gi snod// sdig pa'i grogs dang bdud dang bgegs// log 'dren rnams kyis mi
53a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa// de la de nyid dag pa ni// rtog po thams cad rnam spangs pa// sems can kun dung tshangs sogs kyis// rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa'i// shin tu rmad 'byung ye shes ni// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba dag/ tshe 'di nyid la 'grub/
53a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// 'jig rten mgron gyis gsungs pa yin// ye shes grub pa las// phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo las// phung po lnga ni rgyal bar bshad// khams rnams
53a6(rgyud 'grel): spyor la sogs yin te// ngo bos sangs rgyas skur 'dong ngo // de lta yin na srog tshogs kun// srid gsum rtag tu rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyid phyir bya kun dang // thos dang bsgom pa don med do// 'jig rten thams cad sangs
53b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas na// ljongs pa kun kyang mo 'byung la// bad dang sdug bsngal bsgom la sogs// gnod pa de la yod mya yin// bral te spangs rgyasu sbyar gyur na// mngon shes drug la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyam yon tan 'byor pa ya /
53b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir de dag med par 'gyur// gang yang de ltar mi shes pa// de ni rdzogs sangs ji ltar 'gyur// 'ga' zhig de ltar shes pa ni// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rims kyis bslabs pa yi// sbyor bas sems ni 'jug
53b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i// rnal 'byor pa ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzhan dag sangs rgyas 'grub pa min// gal te ngang gis sangs rgyas na// bslab pa dgongs pa ci zhig yod// rig par bcas pa'i goms bya yin// reg pa med par goms
53b4(rgyud 'grel): bya min// gal te mgon med skye bo 'ga'// rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bsgoms pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang // 'di ni rgyal po thob mi 'gyur// gang zhig log pa'i rtog pas ni// gang la rgyal po yod min ltar// de
53b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin log par bsgoms pa yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ma yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rgyal du// phung po skye mched la sogs pa// de nyid dam tshig skad ces pas// de dang de ming gis brtan pa// dri chen rnam snang zhes
53b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad de// gci ba de bzhin rdo rje chu// ji ltar mo dbang pad+ma ste// ji ltar pho dbang rdo rje yin// gang phyir lung dang rig pa yi// rjes 'brang smra bar mi nus pas// de bas gang gis lha yi sku// smra bar nus pa ma yin no// gal te byas pa'i/
54a1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gzugs// rdo rje sems dpa' gyur na go// gang phyir 'dus byas las byung bas// bum pa la sogs bzhin du 'jug/ de bas byang chub spyod pa ni// du ma'ang 'bras bu med par 'gyur// gal te byung nas zhig 'gyur//
54a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ bsgom pa nyid ni don cir 'gyur// yid kyi rang bzhin byas pa'i gzugs// ji ltar 'dus byas yin zhes bshad// de dang de ni ji ltar 'jig/ rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho khyod nyon cig/ 'di rnams sems kyis brtags pa ste// de yang 'dus
54a3(rgyud 'grel): byas mtshan nyid na// yid kyi brtags pa gang yin de// mi 'jigs par ni ji ltar 'gyur// phyag dang sku mdog yang dag ldan// ji ltar sngon nas rnam bzhugs pa// ma byas pa yi lha'i sku// gal te de nyid du bsgom bya// ma skyes ngo bor gnas pa
54a4(rgyud 'grel): sto// bsgoms pas dgos pa ci zhig yod// de 'dra'i gzugs su ma gyur pas// de 'dir bdag ces bsgom pas na// rnal 'byor pa rnams gzugs bsgom pa// de 'dra'i gzugs su gyur pa'am// de ni bdag yin zhes sgom bya// bsgom pa gnyi su 'di rnams
54a5(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ de 'drar bdag ni 'gyur ro zhes// gang tshe bsam gtan gyis brtags pa// gang tshe bsam gtan gsal gyur pa// lha rnams su yang de snang 'gyur// khyod kyi ras ris sogs gzugs ltas// gang tshe bsam gtan rnams bsgoms pa// de ni 'ong
54a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bsam gtan gyis// de bzhin skyes par 'gyur ma yin// ma skyes pa yi lha yi sku// khyod kyis bsam gtan gyis byin na// mngon shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing // de gzugs kyang skad cig nges// de ltar khyod la yang dag med// bsam gtan
54b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni gang du 'ongs// khyed nyid kyis ni skyeng ba'i sku// bcos ma yin par bcos ma rtogs// bdag nyid de yin zhes phyogs kyang // gnyis pa der ni yod min te// grub pa'i sgrub pa min min na// bsam gtan brtag pa ji lta bu// kun mkhyen nyid ni
54b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen// slar yang thob par med bzhin do// sangs rgyas mdzad pa khyod byed na// sangs rgyas nyid pas byed bcug mod// de ltar yang dag khyed la med// ji ltar log par rtog par byed// ma byas sangs rgyas sku gang yin// de bdag yin zhes bya
54b3(rgyud 'grel): don med// ma byas pa yi lha yi sku// de ni de ltar rnam par dpyad// gzugs ni yin pas bum sogs yin// ma byas de smra nus ma yin// de bas 'gro ba'i mgon po yis// byis pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i phyir// sku yi mi rtag ston mdzad pas// mya
54b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das pa gnyis brtan mdzad// de bas sangs rgyas skur ldan par// 'jig rten gar yang 'byung ma yin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab sgrub phyir// gzugs kyi bsgom par bya ba min// ji ltar sangs rgyas gzugs med pa'i// rigs pa bems
54b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag nyid nyon// yul na gnas gyur gzugs can ni// mngon shes drug tu ji ltar 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams// mig gi skye mched la sogs pa// der rnams der ni 'ongs ma
54b6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ gang tshe mig la sogs pa yi// 'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na// de rnams ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// ma phrad na ni kun rig min// song nas shes par 'gyur zhe na// rims kyis shes par ji ltar nus// shes bya du ma'i ngo bo bas//
55a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa de 'du med// sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa yi// de bas dgongs pa yod ma yin// mig mogs dbang po ma gtogs pa// lus gzhan dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan lta bur sems
55a2(rgyud 'grel): med par// sangs rgyas sku ni shes byas na// gang phyir yang dag rigs med pas// sangs rgyas sgra ni kun mkhyen min// cher ldan rnams kyi sgra yi spyan// sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' bar bshad// lho yi stan ni thams cad mnga'// ji ltar
55a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen te min// gal te ye shes kyis mkhyen na// de tshe sangs rgyas sus ci bya// skyur gnas ye shes der rig pas// de bas sma ni su mkhyen yin// sku las tha dad tha dad min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// sku dang yan lag
55a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhe na// mya ngan 'das na de yang 'jig/ lus ni 'jig pa'i chos can pas// ye shes kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// de bas sangs rgyas yo shes sku// 'jig par rig pa ma yin no// sku med pas na sku mkhyen min// rten 'brel las byung ye shes
55a5(rgyud 'grel): de/ de bas 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur// nyams 'gyur ye shes sku rnams ni// thams cad mkhyen nyid mi rigs so// de bas sangs rgyas sku dag ni// thams cad mkhyen par bya ba min// ye shes las gzhan phyogs la yang // sangs rgyas skur
55a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ji ltar 'gyur// 'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du// de ltar rnal 'byor smra ba'i rigs// gang zhig 'jig rten mongs pa rnams// gzugs gang bsam por 'dod pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub phyir// namakha' za bar 'dod
55b1(rgyud 'grel): yin// 'gro la snying rje dman pa dang // thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams la// de rnams blo gros yod ma yin// de lta'i chos dang bral ba ni// phan tshun dag ni rgyug pa na// chos la rmongs rnams smyon pa bzhin//
55b2(rgyud 'grel): ga yang sa dag tu btung 'gyur ba// de dag kun la khyad par du// snying rje chen po bya ba ste// yang dag ye shes nyer shes pas// de la brnyas par rigs ma yin// ye shes grub pa las gzugs su bsgom pa dgag pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//
55b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gzugs su bsgom pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub ste// rnam bcas rtog pas kyang de bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub po// rnam nyid ye shes de yin pas// rnam pa las ni tha dad 'gyur// 'on te rnam pa ye shes 'gyur// de ltar 'di/
55b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mi rigs so// rnam pa ye shes de min te// shes la rnam pa nyid med de// dper na bum pa mkhar mi 'gyur// mkha' yang bum par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs med gzugs su mi 'gyur te// gzugs med gzugs can yod ma yin// ye shes gzu
55b5(rgyud 'grel): ni med par grags// rnam pa gzugs can yin par bshad// ji ltar de gnyis gzhan min nyid// 'gyur ba yin zhes brtag par bya// rnam par ye shes nyid yin zhes// rtog pa 'di yang mi rigs so// nges par gzhan du thal 'gyur ba// mdo
55b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam du ni mnyan par bgyi// gal te rnam de shes yin na// 'dus byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur// ngo bo 'dus ma byas 'gyur ba// byis pa rnams la yod ma yin// byas pa nyid dang rnam 'jig nyid// sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar 'gyur// thog mtha'
56a1(rgyud 'grel): med cing zhi ba zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam gsung la// de sras rgyal ba chen po yang // ye shes 'dus byas min zhes gsungs// de kun sgyu ma lta bu dang // mig yor lta bur nges bshad de// skye dang 'gag pa med pa dag/
56a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes su de cis mi 'gyur// mig gi rnam shes zhes bya gang // ye shes su ni de mi rtag/ 'gyur ba nyid du thal 'gyur na// sangs rgyas ye shes gzhan du min// ye shes de ni mi 'gyur bar// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te// de bas gcig
56a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du'ang // nges par smra ba rigs ma yin// shes pa'i rab tu snang de yin// ye shes dag tu de mi rtag/ so sor snang ba dgag pa las// ye shes ci phyir dgag mi 'gyur// de bas gcig pa nyid mi 'grub// tshig de shin tu nges yin na//
56a4(rgyud 'grel): ci phyir de dag gcig nyid du// khyed ni yongs su rtog par byed// lung dang rigs pa dang 'gal bas// rnam pa kun tu 'bras bu med// ye shes de nyid rnam par shes// de ltar yang ni mi rigs so// rnam pa las ni tha dad med// shes pa'i
56a5(rgyud 'grel): shes nyid mi rigs te// shes bya las ni shes 'gyur gyi// shes bya med par ma yin no// gal te shes pa tha dad 'gyur// ye shes su ni brtag na ko/ rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ni// ye shes nyid las gnas med yin// ye shes 'byung ba'i dus
56a6(rgyud 'grel): su yang // rnam pa kun tu mi 'byung la// rnam pa'ang kun tu 'byung ba na// ye shes nyid ni mi rigs so// dper na bum pa rdzogs pa la// snam bu 'byung ba med pa bzhin// tha dad pa yi chos rnams ni// ji ltar 'jig rten dag na snang // bu ni ma
56b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dag ni// gzhan dag gis ni gang yin pas// mo gAsham bu ldan 'jig rten na// rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yang med// bu dang bcas pas lha bzhin ni// gang tshe rang gi bur bcas na// gzhan dag gi ni bu yin kyang // bu dang bcas pa'i rigs
56b2(rgyud 'grel): mo yin// de bzhin ye shes gnas med ni// rnam bcas yin par ji ltar 'dod// gang la ltos nas ye shes ni// gang gis de ni rnam bcas 'gyur// ye shes rnam bcas yin zhes pa// rnam pa dang bral ma yin te// rnam pa dang bral ye shes
56b3(rgyud 'grel): mi rnam bcas nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// rnam pa dang bcas gang yin pa// de ni rnam bcas nyid yin na// rnam pa kun las rnam grol ba'i// ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur// gal te rnam pa med kyang ni// 'di ni rnam bcas nyid 'gyur na// sangs
56b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ye shes med par yang // sangs rgyas su khyed cis mi 'gyur// kun mkhyen min te ye shes myin// ye shes tha dad par rab brtags// de bas rnam bcas ye shes la// dngos grub rigs pa ma yino// gal te rnam pa bcas pas ni// rnam
56b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas nyid 'gyur na// sangs rgyas gdung la rab 'jug pas// de dang // da par ma mthong ngo // gzugs can yang dag mi sbyor te// gzugs med pa la rnam kun min// dper na na mkha' bum pa dang // yang dag sbyor bar mi 'dod ltar//
56b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni rnam pa dang ldan yang // de ni rnam bcas 'gyur ma yin// ltos dang bcas pas rnam 'jig nyid// tshogs pa med pa dag tu 'gyur// tshogs pa las byung gang yin te// sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur ma yin// gang tshe ye shes 'dus byas
57a1(rgyud 'grel): bas/ rnam bcas yin par myi 'grub bo// gal te rnam pa ye shes dag/ gzhan nyid dag tu 'gyur na ni// de ltar phan tshun ltos pa dag ye shes sun dzi ltar 'gyur// rnas pa shes las tha dad pa ma// mal tangs ma/
57a2(rgyud 'grel): nanI/ do rnam shes pa las gzhan pas// shes med cing dmyal par 'gyur// gang gig rnam pa las gzhan stod // de bas rnam pa med 'gyur/ shes rnam pa med par ni// m-i phyir de skye rtogs mi byed// sne zhes grub pa lus rnam pa dang ba sa
